00086 static void PE_create_particle_edit(Scene *scene, Object *ob, PointCache *cache, ParticleSystem *psys);
00087 static void PTCacheUndo_clear(PTCacheEdit *edit);
00088 static void recalc_emitter_field(Object *ob, ParticleSystem *psys);

00090 #define KEY_K                   PTCacheEditKey *key; int k
00091 #define POINT_P                 PTCacheEditPoint *point; int p
00092 #define LOOP_POINTS             for (p=0, point=edit->points; p<edit->totpoint; p++, point++)
00093 #define LOOP_VISIBLE_POINTS     for (p=0, point=edit->points; p<edit->totpoint; p++, point++) if (!(point->flag & PEP_HIDE))
00094 #define LOOP_SELECTED_POINTS    for (p=0, point=edit->points; p<edit->totpoint; p++, point++) if (point_is_selected(point))
00095 #define LOOP_UNSELECTED_POINTS  for (p=0, point=edit->points; p<edit->totpoint; p++, point++) if (!point_is_selected(point))
00096 #define LOOP_EDITED_POINTS      for (p=0, point=edit->points; p<edit->totpoint; p++, point++) if (point->flag & PEP_EDIT_RECALC)
00097 #define LOOP_TAGGED_POINTS      for (p=0, point=edit->points; p<edit->totpoint; p++, point++) if (point->flag & PEP_TAG)
00098 #define LOOP_KEYS               for (k=0, key=point->keys; k<point->totkey; k++, key++)
00099 #define LOOP_VISIBLE_KEYS       for (k=0, key=point->keys; k<point->totkey; k++, key++) if (!(key->flag & PEK_HIDE))
00100 #define LOOP_SELECTED_KEYS      for (k=0, key=point->keys; k<point->totkey; k++, key++) if ((key->flag & PEK_SELECT) && !(key->flag & PEK_HIDE))
00101 #define LOOP_TAGGED_KEYS        for (k=0, key=point->keys; k<point->totkey; k++, key++) if (key->flag & PEK_TAG)
00102 
00103 #define KEY_WCO                 (key->flag & PEK_USE_WCO ? key->world_co : key->co)

00107 int PE_poll(bContext *C)
00108 {
00109     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00110     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
00111 
00112     if (!scene || !ob || !(ob->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT))
00113         return 0;
00114     
00115     return (PE_get_current(scene, ob) != NULL);
00116 }
00117 
00118 int PE_hair_poll(bContext *C)
00119 {
00120     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00121     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
00122     PTCacheEdit *edit;
00123 
00124     if (!scene || !ob || !(ob->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT))
00125         return 0;
00126     
00127     edit= PE_get_current(scene, ob);
00128 
00129     return (edit && edit->psys);
00130 }

00132 int PE_poll_view3d(bContext *C)
00133 {
00134     return PE_poll(C) && CTX_wm_area(C)->spacetype == SPACE_VIEW3D &&
00135         CTX_wm_region(C)->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW;
00136 }

00138 void PE_free_ptcache_edit(PTCacheEdit *edit)
00139 {
00140     POINT_P;
00141 
00142     if (edit==0) return;
00143 
00144     PTCacheUndo_clear(edit);
00145 
00146     if (edit->points) {
00147         LOOP_POINTS {
00148             if (point->keys)
00149                 MEM_freeN(point->keys);
00150         }
00151 
00152         MEM_freeN(edit->points);
00153     }
00154 
00155     if (edit->mirror_cache)
00156         MEM_freeN(edit->mirror_cache);
00157 
00158     if (edit->emitter_cosnos) {
00159         MEM_freeN(edit->emitter_cosnos);
00160         edit->emitter_cosnos= 0;
00161     }
00162 
00163     if (edit->emitter_field) {
00164         BLI_kdtree_free(edit->emitter_field);
00165         edit->emitter_field= 0;
00166     }
00167 
00168     psys_free_path_cache(edit->psys, edit);
00169 
00170     MEM_freeN(edit);
00171 }

00177 int PE_start_edit(PTCacheEdit *edit)
00178 {
00179     if (edit) {
00180         edit->edited = 1;
00181         if (edit->psys)
00182             edit->psys->flag |= PSYS_EDITED;
00183         return 1;
00184     }
00185 
00186     return 0;
00187 }

00194 /* always gets at least the first particlesystem even if PSYS_CURRENT flag is not set
00195  *
00196  * note: this function runs on poll, therefor it can runs many times a second
00197  * keep it fast! */
00198 static PTCacheEdit *pe_get_current(Scene *scene, Object *ob, int create)
00199 {
00200     ParticleEditSettings *pset= PE_settings(scene);
00201     PTCacheEdit *edit = NULL;
00202     ListBase pidlist;
00203     PTCacheID *pid;
00204 
00205     if (pset==NULL || ob==NULL)
00206         return NULL;
00207 
00208     pset->scene = scene;
00209     pset->object = ob;
00210 
00211     BKE_ptcache_ids_from_object(&pidlist, ob, NULL, 0);
00212 
00213     /* in the case of only one editable thing, set pset->edittype accordingly */
00214     if (pidlist.first && pidlist.first == pidlist.last) {
00215         pid = pidlist.first;
00216         switch(pid->type) {
00217             case PTCACHE_TYPE_PARTICLES:
00218                 pset->edittype = PE_TYPE_PARTICLES;
00219                 break;
00220             case PTCACHE_TYPE_SOFTBODY:
00221                 pset->edittype = PE_TYPE_SOFTBODY;
00222                 break;
00223             case PTCACHE_TYPE_CLOTH:
00224                 pset->edittype = PE_TYPE_CLOTH;
00225                 break;
00226         }
00227     }
00228 
00229     for (pid=pidlist.first; pid; pid=pid->next) {
00230         if (pset->edittype == PE_TYPE_PARTICLES && pid->type == PTCACHE_TYPE_PARTICLES) {
00231             ParticleSystem *psys = pid->calldata;
00232 
00233             if (psys->flag & PSYS_CURRENT) {
00234                 if (psys->part && psys->part->type == PART_HAIR) {
00235                     if (psys->flag & PSYS_HAIR_DYNAMICS && psys->pointcache->flag & PTCACHE_BAKED) {
00236                         if (create && !psys->pointcache->edit)
00237                             PE_create_particle_edit(scene, ob, pid->cache, NULL);
00238                         edit = pid->cache->edit;
00239                     }
00240                     else {
00241                         if (create && !psys->edit && psys->flag & PSYS_HAIR_DONE)
00242                             PE_create_particle_edit(scene, ob, NULL, psys);
00243                         edit = psys->edit;
00244                     }
00245                 }
00246                 else {
00247                     if (create && pid->cache->flag & PTCACHE_BAKED && !pid->cache->edit)
00248                         PE_create_particle_edit(scene, ob, pid->cache, psys);
00249                     edit = pid->cache->edit;
00250                 }
00251 
00252                 break;
00253             }
00254         }
00255         else if (pset->edittype == PE_TYPE_SOFTBODY && pid->type == PTCACHE_TYPE_SOFTBODY) {
00256             if (create && pid->cache->flag & PTCACHE_BAKED && !pid->cache->edit) {
00257                 pset->flag |= PE_FADE_TIME;
00258                 // NICE TO HAVE but doesn't work: pset->brushtype = PE_BRUSH_COMB;
00259                 PE_create_particle_edit(scene, ob, pid->cache, NULL);
00260             }
00261             edit = pid->cache->edit;
00262             break;
00263         }
00264         else if (pset->edittype == PE_TYPE_CLOTH && pid->type == PTCACHE_TYPE_CLOTH) {
00265             if (create && pid->cache->flag & PTCACHE_BAKED && !pid->cache->edit) {
00266                 pset->flag |= PE_FADE_TIME;
00267                 // NICE TO HAVE but doesn't work: pset->brushtype = PE_BRUSH_COMB;
00268                 PE_create_particle_edit(scene, ob, pid->cache, NULL);
00269             }
00270             edit = pid->cache->edit;
00271             break;
00272         }
00273     }
00274 
00275     if (edit)
00276         edit->pid = *pid;
00277 
00278     BLI_freelistN(&pidlist);
00279 
00280     return edit;
00281 }

00299 void PE_hide_keys_time(Scene *scene, PTCacheEdit *edit, float cfra)
00300 {
00301     ParticleEditSettings *pset=PE_settings(scene);
00302     POINT_P; KEY_K;
00303 
00304 
00305     if (pset->flag & PE_FADE_TIME && pset->selectmode==SCE_SELECT_POINT) {
00306         LOOP_POINTS {
00307             LOOP_KEYS {
00308                 if (fabs(cfra-*key->time) < pset->fade_frames)
00309                     key->flag &= ~PEK_HIDE;
00310                 else {
00311                     key->flag |= PEK_HIDE;
00312                     //key->flag &= ~PEK_SELECT;
00313                 }
00314             }
00315         }
00316     }
00317     else {
00318         LOOP_POINTS {
00319             LOOP_KEYS {
00320                 key->flag &= ~PEK_HIDE;
00321             }
00322         }
00323     }
00324 }

00327 {

00329         return (((Mesh*)ob->data)->editflag & ME_EDIT_MIRROR_X);
00330     
00331     return 0;
00332 }

00366 static void PE_set_data(bContext *C, PEData *data)
00367 {
00368     memset(data, 0, sizeof(*data));
00369 
00370     data->scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00371     data->ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
00372     data->edit= PE_get_current(data->scene, data->ob);
00373 }
00374 
00375 static void PE_set_view3d_data(bContext *C, PEData *data)
00376 {
00377     PE_set_data(C, data);
00378 
00379     view3d_set_viewcontext(C, &data->vc);
00380     /* note, the object argument means the modelview matrix does not account for the objects matrix, use viewmat rather than (obmat * viewmat) */
00381     view3d_get_transformation(data->vc.ar, data->vc.rv3d, NULL, &data->mats);
00382 
00383     if ((data->vc.v3d->drawtype>OB_WIRE) && (data->vc.v3d->flag & V3D_ZBUF_SELECT)) {
00384         if (data->vc.v3d->flag & V3D_INVALID_BACKBUF) {
00385             /* needed or else the draw matrix can be incorrect */
00386             view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
00387 
00388             view3d_validate_backbuf(&data->vc);
00389             /* we may need to force an update here by setting the rv3d as dirty
00390              * for now it seems ok, but take care!:
00391              * rv3d->depths->dirty = 1; */
00392             ED_view3d_depth_update(data->vc.ar);
00393         }
00394     }
00395 }

00397 /*************************** selection utilities *******************************/
00398 
00399 static int key_test_depth(PEData *data, const float co[3])
00400 {
00401     View3D *v3d= data->vc.v3d;
00402     double ux, uy, uz;
00403     float depth;
00404     short wco[3], x,y;
00405 
00406     /* nothing to do */
00407     if ((v3d->drawtype<=OB_WIRE) || (v3d->flag & V3D_ZBUF_SELECT)==0)
00408         return 1;
00409 
00410     project_short(data->vc.ar, co, wco);
00411     
00412     if (wco[0] == IS_CLIPPED)
00413         return 0;
00414 
00415     gluProject(co[0],co[1],co[2], data->mats.modelview, data->mats.projection,
00416                (GLint *)data->mats.viewport, &ux, &uy, &uz);
00417 
00418     x=wco[0];
00419     y=wco[1];
00420 
00421 #if 0 /* works well but too slow on some systems [#23118] */
00422     x+= (short)data->vc.ar->winrct.xmin;
00423     y+= (short)data->vc.ar->winrct.ymin;
00424 
00425     /* PE_set_view3d_data calls this. no need to call here */
00426     /* view3d_validate_backbuf(&data->vc); */
00427     glReadPixels(x, y, 1, 1, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT, GL_FLOAT, &depth);
00428 #else /* faster to use depths, these are calculated in PE_set_view3d_data */
00429     {
00430         ViewDepths *vd = data->vc.rv3d->depths;
00431         assert(vd && vd->depths);
00432         /* we know its not clipped */
00433         depth= vd->depths[y * vd->w + x];
00434     }
00435 #endif
00436 
00437     if ((float)uz - 0.00001f > depth)
00438         return 0;
00439     else
00440         return 1;
00441 }
00442 
00443 static int key_inside_circle(PEData *data, float rad, const float co[3], float *distance)
00444 {
00445     float dx, dy, dist;
00446     int sco[2];
00447 
00448     project_int(data->vc.ar, co, sco);
00449     
00450     if (sco[0] == IS_CLIPPED)
00451         return 0;
00452     
00453     dx= data->mval[0] - sco[0];
00454     dy= data->mval[1] - sco[1];
00455     dist= sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy);
00456 
00457     if (dist > rad)
00458         return 0;
00459 
00460     if (key_test_depth(data, co)) {
00461         if (distance)
00462             *distance=dist;
00463 
00464         return 1;
00465     }
00466     
00467     return 0;
00468 }
00469 
00470 static int key_inside_rect(PEData *data, const float co[3])
00471 {
00472     int sco[2];
00473 
00474     project_int(data->vc.ar, co,sco);
00475 
00476     if (sco[0] == IS_CLIPPED)
00477         return 0;
00478     
00479     if (sco[0] > data->rect->xmin && sco[0] < data->rect->xmax &&
00480        sco[1] > data->rect->ymin && sco[1] < data->rect->ymax)
00481         return key_test_depth(data, co);
00482 
00483     return 0;
00484 }
00485 
00486 static int key_inside_test(PEData *data, const float co[3])
00487 {
00488     if (data->mval)
00489         return key_inside_circle(data, data->rad, co, NULL);
00490     else
00491         return key_inside_rect(data, co);
00492 }
00493 
00494 static int point_is_selected(PTCacheEditPoint *point)
00495 {
00496     KEY_K;
00497 
00498     if (point->flag & PEP_HIDE)
00499         return 0;
00500 
00501     LOOP_SELECTED_KEYS {
00502         return 1;
00503     }
00504     
00505     return 0;
00506 }

00508 /*************************** iterators *******************************/
00509 
00510 typedef void (*ForPointFunc)(PEData *data, int point_index);
00511 typedef void (*ForKeyFunc)(PEData *data, int point_index, int key_index);
00512 typedef void (*ForKeyMatFunc)(PEData *data, float mat[][4], float imat[][4], int point_index, int key_index, PTCacheEditKey *key);
00513 
00514 static void for_mouse_hit_keys(PEData *data, ForKeyFunc func, int nearest)
00515 {
00516     ParticleEditSettings *pset= PE_settings(data->scene);
00517     PTCacheEdit *edit= data->edit;
00518     POINT_P; KEY_K;
00519     int nearest_point, nearest_key;
00520     float dist= data->rad;
00521 
00522     /* in path select mode we have no keys */
00523     if (pset->selectmode==SCE_SELECT_PATH)
00524         return;
00525 
00526     nearest_point= -1;
00527     nearest_key= -1;
00528 
00529     LOOP_VISIBLE_POINTS {
00530         if (pset->selectmode == SCE_SELECT_END) {
00531             /* only do end keys */
00532             key= point->keys + point->totkey-1;
00533 
00534             if (nearest) {
00535                 if (key_inside_circle(data, dist, KEY_WCO, &dist)) {
00536                     nearest_point= p;
00537                     nearest_key= point->totkey-1;
00538                 }
00539             }
00540             else if (key_inside_test(data, KEY_WCO))
00541                 func(data, p, point->totkey-1);
00542         }
00543         else {
00544             /* do all keys */
00545             LOOP_VISIBLE_KEYS {
00546                 if (nearest) {
00547                     if (key_inside_circle(data, dist, KEY_WCO, &dist)) {
00548                         nearest_point= p;
00549                         nearest_key= k;
00550                     }
00551                 }
00552                 else if (key_inside_test(data, KEY_WCO))
00553                     func(data, p, k);
00554             }
00555         }
00556     }
00557 
00558     /* do nearest only */
00559     if (nearest && nearest_point > -1)
00560         func(data, nearest_point, nearest_key);
00561 }
00562 
00563 static void foreach_mouse_hit_point(PEData *data, ForPointFunc func, int selected)
00564 {
00565     ParticleEditSettings *pset= PE_settings(data->scene);
00566     PTCacheEdit *edit= data->edit;
00567     POINT_P; KEY_K;
00568 
00569     /* all is selected in path mode */
00570     if (pset->selectmode==SCE_SELECT_PATH)
00571         selected=0;
00572 
00573     LOOP_VISIBLE_POINTS {
00574         if (pset->selectmode==SCE_SELECT_END) {
00575             /* only do end keys */
00576             key= point->keys + point->totkey - 1;
00577 
00578             if (selected==0 || key->flag & PEK_SELECT)
00579                 if (key_inside_circle(data, data->rad, KEY_WCO, &data->dist))
00580                     func(data, p);
00581         }
00582         else {
00583             /* do all keys */
00584             LOOP_VISIBLE_KEYS {
00585                 if (selected==0 || key->flag & PEK_SELECT) {
00586                     if (key_inside_circle(data, data->rad, KEY_WCO, &data->dist)) {
00587                         func(data, p);
00588                         break;
00589                     }
00590                 }
00591             }
00592         }
00593     }
00594 }
00595 
00596 static void foreach_mouse_hit_key(PEData *data, ForKeyMatFunc func, int selected)
00597 {
00598     PTCacheEdit *edit = data->edit;
00599     ParticleSystem *psys = edit->psys;
00600     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd = NULL;
00601     ParticleEditSettings *pset= PE_settings(data->scene);
00602     POINT_P; KEY_K;
00603     float mat[4][4]= MAT4_UNITY, imat[4][4]= MAT4_UNITY;
00604 
00605     if (edit->psys)
00606         psmd= psys_get_modifier(data->ob, edit->psys);
00607 
00608     /* all is selected in path mode */
00609     if (pset->selectmode==SCE_SELECT_PATH)
00610         selected= 0;
00611 
00612     LOOP_VISIBLE_POINTS {
00613         if (pset->selectmode==SCE_SELECT_END) {
00614             /* only do end keys */
00615             key= point->keys + point->totkey-1;
00616 
00617             if (selected==0 || key->flag & PEK_SELECT) {
00618                 if (key_inside_circle(data, data->rad, KEY_WCO, &data->dist)) {
00619                     if (edit->psys && !(edit->psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR)) {
00620                         psys_mat_hair_to_global(data->ob, psmd->dm, psys->part->from, psys->particles + p, mat);
00621                         invert_m4_m4(imat,mat);
00622                     }
00623 
00624                     func(data, mat, imat, p, point->totkey-1, key);
00625                 }
00626             }
00627         }
00628         else {
00629             /* do all keys */
00630             LOOP_VISIBLE_KEYS {
00631                 if (selected==0 || key->flag & PEK_SELECT) {
00632                     if (key_inside_circle(data, data->rad, KEY_WCO, &data->dist)) {
00633                         if (edit->psys && !(edit->psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR)) {
00634                             psys_mat_hair_to_global(data->ob, psmd->dm, psys->part->from, psys->particles + p, mat);
00635                             invert_m4_m4(imat,mat);
00636                         }
00637 
00638                         func(data, mat, imat, p, k, key);
00639                     }
00640                 }
00641             }
00642         }
00643     }
00644 }
00645 
00646 static void foreach_selected_point(PEData *data, ForPointFunc func)
00647 {
00648     PTCacheEdit *edit = data->edit;
00649     POINT_P;
00650 
00651     LOOP_SELECTED_POINTS {
00652         func(data, p);
00653     }
00654 }
00655 
00656 static void foreach_selected_key(PEData *data, ForKeyFunc func)
00657 {
00658     PTCacheEdit *edit = data->edit;
00659     POINT_P; KEY_K;
00660 
00661     LOOP_VISIBLE_POINTS {
00662         LOOP_SELECTED_KEYS {
00663             func(data, p, k);
00664         }
00665     }
00666 }
00667 
00668 static void foreach_point(PEData *data, ForPointFunc func)
00669 {
00670     PTCacheEdit *edit = data->edit;
00671     POINT_P;
00672 
00673     LOOP_POINTS { 
00674         func(data, p);
00675     }
00676 }
00677 
00678 static int count_selected_keys(Scene *scene, PTCacheEdit *edit)
00679 {
00680     ParticleEditSettings *pset= PE_settings(scene);
00681     POINT_P; KEY_K;
00682     int sel= 0;
00683 
00684     LOOP_VISIBLE_POINTS {
00685         if (pset->selectmode==SCE_SELECT_POINT) {
00686             LOOP_SELECTED_KEYS {
00687                 sel++;
00688             }
00689         }
00690         else if (pset->selectmode==SCE_SELECT_END) {
00691             key = point->keys + point->totkey - 1;
00692             if (key->flag & PEK_SELECT)
00693                 sel++;
00694         }
00695     }
00696 
00697     return sel;
00698 }
00699 
00700 /************************************************/
00701 /*          Particle Edit Mirroring             */
00702 /************************************************/
00703 
00704 static void PE_update_mirror_cache(Object *ob, ParticleSystem *psys)
00705 {
00706     PTCacheEdit *edit;
00707     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd;
00708     KDTree *tree;
00709     KDTreeNearest nearest;
00710     HairKey *key;
00711     PARTICLE_P;
00712     float mat[4][4], co[3];
00713     int index, totpart;
00714 
00715     edit= psys->edit;
00716     psmd= psys_get_modifier(ob, psys);
00717     totpart= psys->totpart;
00718 
00719     if (!psmd->dm)
00720         return;
00721 
00722     tree= BLI_kdtree_new(totpart);
00723 
00724     /* insert particles into kd tree */
00725     LOOP_PARTICLES {
00726         key = pa->hair;
00727         psys_mat_hair_to_orco(ob, psmd->dm, psys->part->from, pa, mat);
00728         copy_v3_v3(co, key->co);
00729         mul_m4_v3(mat, co);
00730         BLI_kdtree_insert(tree, p, co, NULL);
00731     }
00732 
00733     BLI_kdtree_balance(tree);
00734 
00735     /* lookup particles and set in mirror cache */
00736     if (!edit->mirror_cache)
00737         edit->mirror_cache= MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*totpart, "PE mirror cache");
00738     
00739     LOOP_PARTICLES {
00740         key = pa->hair;
00741         psys_mat_hair_to_orco(ob, psmd->dm, psys->part->from, pa, mat);
00742         copy_v3_v3(co, key->co);
00743         mul_m4_v3(mat, co);
00744         co[0]= -co[0];
00745 
00746         index= BLI_kdtree_find_nearest(tree, co, NULL, &nearest);
00747 
00748         /* this needs a custom threshold still, duplicated for editmode mirror */
00749         if (index != -1 && index != p && (nearest.dist <= 0.0002f))
00750             edit->mirror_cache[p]= index;
00751         else
00752             edit->mirror_cache[p]= -1;
00753     }
00754 
00755     /* make sure mirrors are in two directions */
00756     LOOP_PARTICLES {
00757         if (edit->mirror_cache[p]) {
00758             index= edit->mirror_cache[p];
00759             if (edit->mirror_cache[index] != p)
00760                 edit->mirror_cache[p]= -1;
00761         }
00762     }
00763 
00764     BLI_kdtree_free(tree);
00765 }
00766 
00767 static void PE_mirror_particle(Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm, ParticleSystem *psys, ParticleData *pa, ParticleData *mpa)
00768 {
00769     HairKey *hkey, *mhkey;
00770     PTCacheEditPoint *point, *mpoint;
00771     PTCacheEditKey *key, *mkey;
00772     PTCacheEdit *edit;
00773     float mat[4][4], mmat[4][4], immat[4][4];
00774     int i, mi, k;
00775 
00776     edit= psys->edit;
00777     i= pa - psys->particles;
00778 
00779     /* find mirrored particle if needed */
00780     if (!mpa) {
00781         if (!edit->mirror_cache)
00782             PE_update_mirror_cache(ob, psys);
00783         
00784         if (!edit->mirror_cache)
00785             return; /* something went wrong! */
00786 
00787         mi= edit->mirror_cache[i];
00788         if (mi == -1)
00789             return;
00790         mpa= psys->particles + mi;
00791     }
00792     else
00793         mi= mpa - psys->particles;
00794 
00795     point = edit->points + i;
00796     mpoint = edit->points + mi;
00797 
00798     /* make sure they have the same amount of keys */
00799     if (pa->totkey != mpa->totkey) {
00800         if (mpa->hair) MEM_freeN(mpa->hair);
00801         if (mpoint->keys) MEM_freeN(mpoint->keys);
00802 
00803         mpa->hair= MEM_dupallocN(pa->hair);
00804         mpa->totkey= pa->totkey;
00805         mpoint->keys= MEM_dupallocN(point->keys);
00806         mpoint->totkey= point->totkey;
00807 
00808         mhkey= mpa->hair;
00809         mkey= mpoint->keys;
00810         for (k=0; k<mpa->totkey; k++, mkey++, mhkey++) {
00811             mkey->co= mhkey->co;
00812             mkey->time= &mhkey->time;
00813             mkey->flag &= ~PEK_SELECT;
00814         }
00815     }
00816 
00817     /* mirror positions and tags */
00818     psys_mat_hair_to_orco(ob, dm, psys->part->from, pa, mat);
00819     psys_mat_hair_to_orco(ob, dm, psys->part->from, mpa, mmat);
00820     invert_m4_m4(immat, mmat);
00821 
00822     hkey=pa->hair;
00823     mhkey=mpa->hair;
00824     key= point->keys;
00825     mkey= mpoint->keys;
00826     for (k=0; k<pa->totkey; k++, hkey++, mhkey++, key++, mkey++) {
00827         copy_v3_v3(mhkey->co, hkey->co);
00828         mul_m4_v3(mat, mhkey->co);
00829         mhkey->co[0]= -mhkey->co[0];
00830         mul_m4_v3(immat, mhkey->co);
00831 
00832         if (key->flag & PEK_TAG)
00833             mkey->flag |= PEK_TAG;
00834 
00835         mkey->length = key->length;
00836     }
00837 
00838     if (point->flag & PEP_TAG)
00839         mpoint->flag |= PEP_TAG;
00840     if (point->flag & PEP_EDIT_RECALC)
00841         mpoint->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
00842 }
00843 
00844 static void PE_apply_mirror(Object *ob, ParticleSystem *psys)
00845 {
00846     PTCacheEdit *edit;
00847     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd;
00848     POINT_P;
00849 
00850     if (!psys)
00851         return;
00852 
00853     edit= psys->edit;
00854     psmd= psys_get_modifier(ob, psys);
00855 
00856     if (!psmd->dm)
00857         return;
00858 
00859     if (!edit->mirror_cache)
00860         PE_update_mirror_cache(ob, psys);
00861 
00862     if (!edit->mirror_cache)
00863         return; /* something went wrong */
00864 
00865     /* we delay settings the PARS_EDIT_RECALC for mirrored particles
00866      * to avoid doing mirror twice */
00867     LOOP_POINTS {
00868         if (point->flag & PEP_EDIT_RECALC) {
00869             PE_mirror_particle(ob, psmd->dm, psys, psys->particles + p, NULL);
00870 
00871             if (edit->mirror_cache[p] != -1)
00872                 edit->points[edit->mirror_cache[p]].flag &= ~PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
00873         }
00874     }
00875 
00876     LOOP_POINTS {
00877         if (point->flag & PEP_EDIT_RECALC)
00878             if (edit->mirror_cache[p] != -1)
00879                 edit->points[edit->mirror_cache[p]].flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
00880     }
00881 }
00882 
00883 /************************************************/
00884 /*          Edit Calculation                    */
00885 /************************************************/
00886 /* tries to stop edited particles from going through the emitter's surface */
00887 static void pe_deflect_emitter(Scene *scene, Object *ob, PTCacheEdit *edit)
00888 {
00889     ParticleEditSettings *pset= PE_settings(scene);
00890     ParticleSystem *psys;
00891     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd;
00892     POINT_P; KEY_K;
00893     int index;
00894     float *vec, *nor, dvec[3], dot, dist_1st=0.0f;
00895     float hairimat[4][4], hairmat[4][4];
00896 
00897     if (edit==NULL || edit->psys==NULL || (pset->flag & PE_DEFLECT_EMITTER)==0 || (edit->psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR))
00898         return;
00899 
00900     psys = edit->psys;
00901     psmd = psys_get_modifier(ob,psys);
00902 
00903     if (!psmd->dm)
00904         return;
00905 
00906     LOOP_EDITED_POINTS {
00907         psys_mat_hair_to_object(ob, psmd->dm, psys->part->from, psys->particles + p, hairmat);
00908     
00909         LOOP_KEYS {
00910             mul_m4_v3(hairmat, key->co);
00911         }
00912 
00913         LOOP_KEYS {
00914             if (k==0) {
00915                 dist_1st = len_v3v3((key+1)->co, key->co);
00916                 dist_1st *= 0.75f * pset->emitterdist;
00917             }
00918             else {
00919                 index= BLI_kdtree_find_nearest(edit->emitter_field,key->co,NULL,NULL);
00920                 
00921                 vec=edit->emitter_cosnos +index*6;
00922                 nor=vec+3;
00923 
00924                 sub_v3_v3v3(dvec, key->co, vec);
00925 
00926                 dot=dot_v3v3(dvec,nor);
00927                 copy_v3_v3(dvec,nor);
00928 
00929                 if (dot>0.0f) {
00930                     if (dot<dist_1st) {
00931                         normalize_v3(dvec);
00932                         mul_v3_fl(dvec,dist_1st-dot);
00933                         add_v3_v3(key->co, dvec);
00934                     }
00935                 }
00936                 else {
00937                     normalize_v3(dvec);
00938                     mul_v3_fl(dvec,dist_1st-dot);
00939                     add_v3_v3(key->co, dvec);
00940                 }
00941                 if (k==1)
00942                     dist_1st*=1.3333f;
00943             }
00944         }
00945         
00946         invert_m4_m4(hairimat,hairmat);
00947 
00948         LOOP_KEYS {
00949             mul_m4_v3(hairimat, key->co);
00950         }
00951     }
00952 }
00953 /* force set distances between neighboring keys */
00954 static void PE_apply_lengths(Scene *scene, PTCacheEdit *edit)
00955 {
00956     
00957     ParticleEditSettings *pset=PE_settings(scene);
00958     POINT_P; KEY_K;
00959     float dv1[3];
00960 
00961     if (edit==0 || (pset->flag & PE_KEEP_LENGTHS)==0)
00962         return;
00963 
00964     if (edit->psys && edit->psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR)
00965         return;
00966 
00967     LOOP_EDITED_POINTS {
00968         LOOP_KEYS {
00969             if (k) {
00970                 sub_v3_v3v3(dv1, key->co, (key - 1)->co);
00971                 normalize_v3(dv1);
00972                 mul_v3_fl(dv1, (key - 1)->length);
00973                 add_v3_v3v3(key->co, (key - 1)->co, dv1);
00974             }
00975         }
00976     }
00977 }
00978 /* try to find a nice solution to keep distances between neighboring keys */
00979 static void pe_iterate_lengths(Scene *scene, PTCacheEdit *edit)
00980 {
00981     ParticleEditSettings *pset=PE_settings(scene);
00982     POINT_P;
00983     PTCacheEditKey *key;
00984     int j, k;
00985     float tlen;
00986     float dv0[3]= {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00987     float dv1[3]= {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00988     float dv2[3]= {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00989 
00990     if (edit==0 || (pset->flag & PE_KEEP_LENGTHS)==0)
00991         return;
00992 
00993     if (edit->psys && edit->psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR)
00994         return;
00995 
00996     LOOP_EDITED_POINTS {
00997         for (j=1; j<point->totkey; j++) {
00998             float mul= 1.0f / (float)point->totkey;
00999 
01000             if (pset->flag & PE_LOCK_FIRST) {
01001                 key= point->keys + 1;
01002                 k= 1;
01003                 dv1[0]= dv1[1]= dv1[2]= 0.0;
01004             }
01005             else {
01006                 key= point->keys;
01007                 k= 0;
01008                 dv0[0]= dv0[1]= dv0[2]= 0.0;
01009             }
01010 
01011             for (; k<point->totkey; k++, key++) {
01012                 if (k) {
01013                     sub_v3_v3v3(dv0, (key - 1)->co, key->co);
01014                     tlen= normalize_v3(dv0);
01015                     mul_v3_fl(dv0, (mul * (tlen - (key - 1)->length)));
01016                 }
01017 
01018                 if (k < point->totkey - 1) {
01019                     sub_v3_v3v3(dv2, (key + 1)->co, key->co);
01020                     tlen= normalize_v3(dv2);
01021                     mul_v3_fl(dv2, mul * (tlen - key->length));
01022                 }
01023 
01024                 if (k) {
01025                     add_v3_v3((key-1)->co, dv1);
01026                 }
01027 
01028                 add_v3_v3v3(dv1, dv0, dv2);
01029             }
01030         }
01031     }
01032 }
01033 /* set current distances to be kept between neighbouting keys */
01034 static void recalc_lengths(PTCacheEdit *edit)
01035 {
01036     POINT_P; KEY_K;
01037 
01038     if (edit==0)
01039         return;
01040 
01041     LOOP_EDITED_POINTS {
01042         key= point->keys;
01043         for (k=0; k<point->totkey-1; k++, key++) {
01044             key->length= len_v3v3(key->co, (key + 1)->co);
01045         }
01046     }
01047 }
01048 
01049 /* calculate a tree for finding nearest emitter's vertice */
01050 static void recalc_emitter_field(Object *ob, ParticleSystem *psys)
01051 {
01052     DerivedMesh *dm=psys_get_modifier(ob,psys)->dm;
01053     PTCacheEdit *edit= psys->edit;
01054     float *vec, *nor;
01055     int i, totface /*, totvert*/;
01056 
01057     if (!dm)
01058         return;
01059 
01060     if (edit->emitter_cosnos)
01061         MEM_freeN(edit->emitter_cosnos);
01062 
01063     BLI_kdtree_free(edit->emitter_field);
01064 
01065     totface=dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
01066     /*totvert=dm->getNumVerts(dm);*/ /*UNSUED*/
01067 
01068     edit->emitter_cosnos=MEM_callocN(totface*6*sizeof(float),"emitter cosnos");
01069 
01070     edit->emitter_field= BLI_kdtree_new(totface);
01071 
01072     vec=edit->emitter_cosnos;
01073     nor=vec+3;
01074 
01075     for (i=0; i<totface; i++, vec+=6, nor+=6) {
01076         MFace *mface=dm->getTessFaceData(dm,i,CD_MFACE);
01077         MVert *mvert;
01078 
01079         mvert=dm->getVertData(dm,mface->v1,CD_MVERT);
01080         copy_v3_v3(vec,mvert->co);
01081         VECCOPY(nor,mvert->no);
01082 
01083         mvert=dm->getVertData(dm,mface->v2,CD_MVERT);
01084         add_v3_v3v3(vec,vec,mvert->co);
01085         VECADD(nor,nor,mvert->no);
01086 
01087         mvert=dm->getVertData(dm,mface->v3,CD_MVERT);
01088         add_v3_v3v3(vec,vec,mvert->co);
01089         VECADD(nor,nor,mvert->no);
01090 
01091         if (mface->v4) {
01092             mvert=dm->getVertData(dm,mface->v4,CD_MVERT);
01093             add_v3_v3v3(vec,vec,mvert->co);
01094             VECADD(nor,nor,mvert->no);
01095             
01096             mul_v3_fl(vec,0.25);
01097         }
01098         else
01099             mul_v3_fl(vec,0.3333f);
01100 
01101         normalize_v3(nor);
01102 
01103         BLI_kdtree_insert(edit->emitter_field, i, vec, NULL);
01104     }
01105 
01106     BLI_kdtree_balance(edit->emitter_field);
01107 }
01108 
01109 static void PE_update_selection(Scene *scene, Object *ob, int useflag)
01110 {
01111     PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, ob);
01112     HairKey *hkey;
01113     POINT_P; KEY_K;
01114 
01115     /* flag all particles to be updated if not using flag */
01116     if (!useflag)
01117         LOOP_POINTS
01118             point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01119 
01120     /* flush edit key flag to hair key flag to preserve selection 
01121      * on save */
01122     if (edit->psys) LOOP_POINTS {
01123         hkey = edit->psys->particles[p].hair;
01124         LOOP_KEYS {
01125             hkey->editflag= key->flag;
01126             hkey++;
01127         }
01128     }
01129 
01130     psys_cache_edit_paths(scene, ob, edit, CFRA);
01131 
01132 
01133     /* disable update flag */
01134     LOOP_POINTS
01135         point->flag &= ~PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01136 }
01137 
01138 static void update_world_cos(Object *ob, PTCacheEdit *edit)
01139 {
01140     ParticleSystem *psys = edit->psys;
01141     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd= psys_get_modifier(ob, psys);
01142     POINT_P; KEY_K;
01143     float hairmat[4][4];
01144 
01145     if (psys==0 || psys->edit==0 || psmd->dm==NULL)
01146         return;
01147 
01148     LOOP_POINTS {
01149         if (!(psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR))
01150             psys_mat_hair_to_global(ob, psmd->dm, psys->part->from, psys->particles+p, hairmat);
01151 
01152         LOOP_KEYS {
01153             copy_v3_v3(key->world_co,key->co);
01154             if (!(psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR))
01155                 mul_m4_v3(hairmat, key->world_co);
01156         }
01157     }
01158 }
01159 static void update_velocities(PTCacheEdit *edit)
01160 {
01161     /*TODO: get frs_sec properly */
01162     float vec1[3], vec2[3], frs_sec, dfra;
01163     POINT_P; KEY_K;
01164 
01165     /* hair doesn't use velocities */
01166     if (edit->psys || !edit->points || !edit->points->keys->vel)
01167         return;
01168 
01169     frs_sec = edit->pid.flag & PTCACHE_VEL_PER_SEC ? 25.0f : 1.0f;
01170 
01171     LOOP_EDITED_POINTS {
01172         LOOP_KEYS {
01173             if (k==0) {
01174                 dfra = *(key+1)->time - *key->time;
01175 
01176                 if (dfra <= 0.0f)
01177                     continue;
01178 
01179                 sub_v3_v3v3(key->vel, (key+1)->co, key->co);
01180 
01181                 if (point->totkey>2) {
01182                     sub_v3_v3v3(vec1, (key+1)->co, (key+2)->co);
01183                     project_v3_v3v3(vec2, vec1, key->vel);
01184                     sub_v3_v3v3(vec2, vec1, vec2);
01185                     madd_v3_v3fl(key->vel, vec2, 0.5f);
01186                 }
01187             }
01188             else if (k==point->totkey-1) {
01189                 dfra = *key->time - *(key-1)->time;
01190 
01191                 if (dfra <= 0.0f)
01192                     continue;
01193 
01194                 sub_v3_v3v3(key->vel, key->co, (key-1)->co);
01195 
01196                 if (point->totkey>2) {
01197                     sub_v3_v3v3(vec1, (key-2)->co, (key-1)->co);
01198                     project_v3_v3v3(vec2, vec1, key->vel);
01199                     sub_v3_v3v3(vec2, vec1, vec2);
01200                     madd_v3_v3fl(key->vel, vec2, 0.5f);
01201                 }
01202             }
01203             else {
01204                 dfra = *(key+1)->time - *(key-1)->time;
01205                 
01206                 if (dfra <= 0.0f)
01207                     continue;
01208 
01209                 sub_v3_v3v3(key->vel, (key+1)->co, (key-1)->co);
01210             }
01211             mul_v3_fl(key->vel, frs_sec/dfra);
01212         }
01213     }
01214 }
01215 
01216 void PE_update_object(Scene *scene, Object *ob, int useflag)
01217 {
01218     /* use this to do partial particle updates, not usable when adding or
01219      * removing, then a full redo is necessary and calling this may crash */
01220     ParticleEditSettings *pset= PE_settings(scene);
01221     PTCacheEdit *edit = PE_get_current(scene, ob);
01222     POINT_P;
01223 
01224     if (!edit)
01225         return;
01226 
01227     /* flag all particles to be updated if not using flag */
01228     if (!useflag)
01229         LOOP_POINTS {
01230             point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01231         }
01232 
01233     /* do post process on particle edit keys */
01234     pe_iterate_lengths(scene, edit);
01235     pe_deflect_emitter(scene, ob, edit);
01236     PE_apply_lengths(scene, edit);
01237     if (pe_x_mirror(ob))
01238         PE_apply_mirror(ob,edit->psys);
01239     if (edit->psys)
01240         update_world_cos(ob, edit);
01241     if (pset->flag & PE_AUTO_VELOCITY)
01242         update_velocities(edit);
01243     PE_hide_keys_time(scene, edit, CFRA);
01244 
01245     /* regenerate path caches */
01246     psys_cache_edit_paths(scene, ob, edit, CFRA);
01247 
01248     /* disable update flag */
01249     LOOP_POINTS {
01250         point->flag &= ~PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01251     }
01252 
01253     if (edit->psys)
01254         edit->psys->flag &= ~PSYS_HAIR_UPDATED;
01255 }
01256 
01257 /************************************************/
01258 /*          Edit Selections                     */
01259 /************************************************/
01260 
01261 /*-----selection callbacks-----*/
01262 
01263 static void select_key(PEData *data, int point_index, int key_index)
01264 {
01265     PTCacheEdit *edit = data->edit;
01266     PTCacheEditPoint *point = edit->points + point_index;
01267     PTCacheEditKey *key = point->keys + key_index;
01268 
01269     if (data->select)
01270         key->flag |= PEK_SELECT;
01271     else
01272         key->flag &= ~PEK_SELECT;
01273 
01274     point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01275 }
01276 
01277 static void select_keys(PEData *data, int point_index, int UNUSED(key_index))
01278 {
01279     PTCacheEdit *edit = data->edit;
01280     PTCacheEditPoint *point = edit->points + point_index;
01281     KEY_K;
01282 
01283     LOOP_KEYS {
01284         if (data->select)
01285             key->flag |= PEK_SELECT;
01286         else
01287             key->flag &= ~PEK_SELECT;
01288     }
01289 
01290     point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01291 }
01292 
01293 static void toggle_key_select(PEData *data, int point_index, int key_index)
01294 {
01295     PTCacheEdit *edit = data->edit;
01296     PTCacheEditPoint *point = edit->points + point_index;
01297     PTCacheEditKey *key = point->keys + key_index;
01298 
01299     key->flag ^= PEK_SELECT;
01300     point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01301 }
01302 
01303 /************************ de select all operator ************************/
01304 
01305 static int pe_select_all_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01306 {
01307     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01308     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
01309     PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, ob);
01310     POINT_P; KEY_K;
01311     int action = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "action");
01312 
01313     if (action == SEL_TOGGLE) {
01314         action = SEL_SELECT;
01315         LOOP_VISIBLE_POINTS {
01316             LOOP_SELECTED_KEYS {
01317                 action = SEL_DESELECT;
01318                 break;
01319             }
01320 
01321             if (action == SEL_DESELECT)
01322                 break;
01323         }
01324     }
01325 
01326     LOOP_VISIBLE_POINTS {
01327         LOOP_VISIBLE_KEYS {
01328             switch (action) {
01329             case SEL_SELECT:
01330                 if ((key->flag & PEK_SELECT) == 0) {
01331                     key->flag |= PEK_SELECT;
01332                     point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01333                 }
01334                 break;
01335             case SEL_DESELECT:
01336                 if (key->flag & PEK_SELECT) {
01337                     key->flag &= ~PEK_SELECT;
01338                     point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01339                 }
01340                 break;
01341             case SEL_INVERT:
01342                 if ((key->flag & PEK_SELECT) == 0) {
01343                     key->flag |= PEK_SELECT;
01344                     point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01345                 }
01346                 else {
01347                     key->flag &= ~PEK_SELECT;
01348                     point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01349                 }
01350                 break;
01351             }
01352         }
01353     }
01354 
01355     PE_update_selection(scene, ob, 1);
01356     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_SELECTED, ob);
01357 
01358     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01359 }
01360 
01361 void PARTICLE_OT_select_all(wmOperatorType *ot)
01362 {
01363     /* identifiers */
01364     ot->name = "(De)select All";
01365     ot->idname = "PARTICLE_OT_select_all";
01366     
01367     /* api callbacks */
01368     ot->exec = pe_select_all_exec;
01369     ot->poll = PE_poll;
01370 
01371     /* flags */
01372     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01373 
01374     WM_operator_properties_select_all(ot);
01375 }

01377 /************************ pick select operator ************************/
01378 
01379 int PE_mouse_particles(bContext *C, const int mval[2], int extend)
01380 {
01381     PEData data;
01382     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01383     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
01384     PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, ob);
01385     POINT_P; KEY_K;
01386     
01387     if (!PE_start_edit(edit))
01388         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01389 
01390     if (!extend) {
01391         LOOP_VISIBLE_POINTS {
01392             LOOP_SELECTED_KEYS {
01393                 key->flag &= ~PEK_SELECT;
01394                 point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01395             }
01396         }
01397     }
01398 
01399     PE_set_view3d_data(C, &data);
01400     data.mval= mval;
01401     data.rad= 75.0f;
01402 
01403     for_mouse_hit_keys(&data, toggle_key_select, 1);  /* nearest only */
01404 
01405     PE_update_selection(scene, ob, 1);
01406     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_SELECTED, data.ob);
01407 
01408     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01409 }

01412 
01413 static void select_root(PEData *data, int point_index)
01414 {
01415     if (data->edit->points[point_index].flag & PEP_HIDE)
01416         return;
01417     
01418     data->edit->points[point_index].keys->flag |= PEK_SELECT;
01419     data->edit->points[point_index].flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC; /* redraw selection only */
01420 }

01423 {

01425 
01426     PE_set_data(C, &data);

01428 
01429     PE_update_selection(data.scene, data.ob, 1);
01430     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_SELECTED, data.ob);
01431 
01432     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01433 }

01507     PE_update_selection(data.scene, data.ob, 1);

01509 
01510     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01511 }

01538 /************************ border select operator ************************/
01539 void PE_deselect_all_visible(PTCacheEdit *edit)
01540 {
01541     POINT_P; KEY_K;
01542 
01543     LOOP_VISIBLE_POINTS {
01544         LOOP_SELECTED_KEYS {
01545             key->flag &= ~PEK_SELECT;
01546             point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01547         }
01548     }
01549 }
01550 
01551 int PE_border_select(bContext *C, rcti *rect, int select, int extend)
01552 {
01553     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01554     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
01555     PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, ob);
01556     PEData data;
01557 
01558     if (!PE_start_edit(edit))
01559         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01560 
01561     if (extend == 0 && select)
01562         PE_deselect_all_visible(edit);
01563 
01564     PE_set_view3d_data(C, &data);
01565     data.rect= rect;
01566     data.select= select;
01567 
01568     for_mouse_hit_keys(&data, select_key, 0);
01569 
01570     PE_update_selection(scene, ob, 1);
01571     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_SELECTED, ob);
01572 
01573     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01574 }

01600 
01601 /************************ lasso select operator ************************/
01602 
01603 int PE_lasso_select(bContext *C, int mcords[][2], short moves, short extend, short select)
01604 {
01605     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01606     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
01607     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
01608     ParticleEditSettings *pset= PE_settings(scene);
01609     PTCacheEdit *edit = PE_get_current(scene, ob);
01610     ParticleSystem *psys = edit->psys;
01611     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd = psys_get_modifier(ob, psys);
01612     POINT_P; KEY_K;
01613     float co[3], mat[4][4]= MAT4_UNITY;
01614     int vertco[2];
01615 
01616     PEData data;
01617 
01618     if (!PE_start_edit(edit))
01619         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01620 
01621     if (extend == 0 && select)
01622         PE_deselect_all_visible(edit);
01623 
01624     /* only for depths */
01625     PE_set_view3d_data(C, &data);
01626 
01627     LOOP_VISIBLE_POINTS {
01628         if (edit->psys && !(psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR))
01629             psys_mat_hair_to_global(ob, psmd->dm, psys->part->from, psys->particles + p, mat);
01630 
01631         if (pset->selectmode==SCE_SELECT_POINT) {
01632             LOOP_KEYS {
01633                 copy_v3_v3(co, key->co);
01634                 mul_m4_v3(mat, co);
01635                 project_int(ar, co, vertco);
01636                 if ((vertco[0] != IS_CLIPPED) && lasso_inside(mcords,moves,vertco[0],vertco[1]) && key_test_depth(&data, co)) {
01637                     if (select && !(key->flag & PEK_SELECT)) {
01638                         key->flag |= PEK_SELECT;
01639                         point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01640                     }
01641                     else if (key->flag & PEK_SELECT) {
01642                         key->flag &= ~PEK_SELECT;
01643                         point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01644                     }
01645                 }
01646             }
01647         }
01648         else if (pset->selectmode==SCE_SELECT_END) {
01649             key= point->keys + point->totkey - 1;
01650 
01651             copy_v3_v3(co, key->co);
01652             mul_m4_v3(mat, co);
01653             project_int(ar, co,vertco);
01654             if ((vertco[0] != IS_CLIPPED) && lasso_inside(mcords,moves,vertco[0],vertco[1]) && key_test_depth(&data, co)) {
01655                 if (select && !(key->flag & PEK_SELECT)) {
01656                     key->flag |= PEK_SELECT;
01657                     point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01658                 }
01659                 else if (key->flag & PEK_SELECT) {
01660                     key->flag &= ~PEK_SELECT;
01661                     point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01662                 }
01663             }
01664         }
01665     }
01666 
01667     PE_update_selection(scene, ob, 1);
01668     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_SELECTED, ob);
01669 
01670     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01671 }
01672 
01673 /*************************** hide operator **************************/
01674 
01675 static int hide_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01676 {
01677     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
01678     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01679     PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, ob);
01680     POINT_P; KEY_K;
01681     
01682     if (RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "unselected")) {
01683         LOOP_UNSELECTED_POINTS {
01684             point->flag |= PEP_HIDE;
01685             point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01686 
01687             LOOP_KEYS
01688                 key->flag &= ~PEK_SELECT;
01689         }
01690     }
01691     else {
01692         LOOP_SELECTED_POINTS {
01693             point->flag |= PEP_HIDE;
01694             point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01695 
01696             LOOP_KEYS
01697                 key->flag &= ~PEK_SELECT;
01698         }
01699     }
01700 
01701     PE_update_selection(scene, ob, 1);
01702     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_SELECTED, ob);
01703 
01704     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01705 }

01712     
01713     /* api callbacks */
01714     ot->exec = hide_exec;
01715     ot->poll = PE_poll;
01716 
01717     /* flags */
01718     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01719 
01720     /* props */
01721     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "unselected", 0, "Unselected", "Hide unselected rather than selected");
01722 }

01724 /*************************** reveal operator **************************/
01725 
01726 static int reveal_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01727 {
01728     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
01729     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01730     PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, ob);
01731     POINT_P; KEY_K;
01732 
01733     LOOP_POINTS {
01734         if (point->flag & PEP_HIDE) {
01735             point->flag &= ~PEP_HIDE;
01736             point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01737 
01738             LOOP_KEYS
01739                 key->flag |= PEK_SELECT;
01740         }
01741     }
01742 
01743     PE_update_selection(scene, ob, 1);
01744     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_SELECTED, ob);
01745 
01746     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;

01762 
01763 /************************ select less operator ************************/
01764 
01765 static void select_less_keys(PEData *data, int point_index)
01766 {
01767     PTCacheEdit *edit= data->edit;
01768     PTCacheEditPoint *point = edit->points + point_index;
01769     KEY_K;
01770 
01771     LOOP_SELECTED_KEYS {
01772         if (k==0) {
01773             if (((key+1)->flag&PEK_SELECT)==0)
01774                 key->flag |= PEK_TAG;
01775         }
01776         else if (k==point->totkey-1) {
01777             if (((key-1)->flag&PEK_SELECT)==0)
01778                 key->flag |= PEK_TAG;
01779         }
01780         else {
01781             if ((((key-1)->flag & (key+1)->flag) & PEK_SELECT)==0)
01782                 key->flag |= PEK_TAG;
01783         }
01784     }
01785 
01786     LOOP_KEYS {
01787         if (key->flag&PEK_TAG) {
01788             key->flag &= ~(PEK_TAG|PEK_SELECT);
01789             point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC; /* redraw selection only */
01790         }
01791     }
01792 }
01793 
01794 static int select_less_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01795 {
01796     PEData data;
01797 
01798     PE_set_data(C, &data);
01799     foreach_point(&data, select_less_keys);
01800 
01801     PE_update_selection(data.scene, data.ob, 1);
01802     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_SELECTED, data.ob);
01803 
01804     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01805 }
01806 
01807 void PARTICLE_OT_select_less(wmOperatorType *ot)
01808 {
01809     /* identifiers */
01810     ot->name = "Select Less";
01811     ot->idname = "PARTICLE_OT_select_less";
01812     
01813     /* api callbacks */
01814     ot->exec = select_less_exec;
01815     ot->poll = PE_poll;
01816 
01817     /* flags */
01818     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01819 }
01820 
01821 /************************ select more operator ************************/
01822 
01823 static void select_more_keys(PEData *data, int point_index)
01824 {
01825     PTCacheEdit *edit= data->edit;
01826     PTCacheEditPoint *point = edit->points + point_index;
01827     KEY_K;
01828 
01829     LOOP_KEYS {
01830         if (key->flag & PEK_SELECT) continue;
01831 
01832         if (k==0) {
01833             if ((key+1)->flag&PEK_SELECT)
01834                 key->flag |= PEK_TAG;
01835         }
01836         else if (k==point->totkey-1) {
01837             if ((key-1)->flag&PEK_SELECT)
01838                 key->flag |= PEK_TAG;
01839         }
01840         else {
01841             if (((key-1)->flag | (key+1)->flag) & PEK_SELECT)
01842                 key->flag |= PEK_TAG;
01843         }
01844     }
01845 
01846     LOOP_KEYS {
01847         if (key->flag&PEK_TAG) {
01848             key->flag &= ~PEK_TAG;
01849             key->flag |= PEK_SELECT;
01850             point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC; /* redraw selection only */
01851         }
01852     }
01853 }
01854 
01855 static int select_more_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01856 {
01857     PEData data;
01858 
01859     PE_set_data(C, &data);
01860     foreach_point(&data, select_more_keys);
01861 
01862     PE_update_selection(data.scene, data.ob, 1);
01863     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_SELECTED, data.ob);
01864 
01865     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01866 }
01867 
01868 void PARTICLE_OT_select_more(wmOperatorType *ot)
01869 {
01870     /* identifiers */
01871     ot->name = "Select More";
01872     ot->idname = "PARTICLE_OT_select_more";
01873     
01874     /* api callbacks */
01875     ot->exec = select_more_exec;
01876     ot->poll = PE_poll;
01877 
01878     /* flags */
01879     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01880 }
01881 
01882 /************************ rekey operator ************************/
01883 
01884 static void rekey_particle(PEData *data, int pa_index)
01885 {
01886     PTCacheEdit *edit= data->edit;
01887     ParticleSystem *psys= edit->psys;
01888     ParticleSimulationData sim= {0};
01889     ParticleData *pa= psys->particles + pa_index;
01890     PTCacheEditPoint *point = edit->points + pa_index;
01891     ParticleKey state;
01892     HairKey *key, *new_keys, *okey;
01893     PTCacheEditKey *ekey;
01894     float dval, sta, end;
01895     int k;
01896 
01897     sim.scene= data->scene;
01898     sim.ob= data->ob;
01899     sim.psys= edit->psys;
01900 
01901     pa->flag |= PARS_REKEY;
01902 
01903     key= new_keys= MEM_callocN(data->totrekey * sizeof(HairKey),"Hair re-key keys");
01904 
01905     okey = pa->hair;
01906     /* root and tip stay the same */
01907     copy_v3_v3(key->co, okey->co);
01908     copy_v3_v3((key + data->totrekey - 1)->co, (okey + pa->totkey - 1)->co);
01909 
01910     sta= key->time= okey->time;
01911     end= (key + data->totrekey - 1)->time= (okey + pa->totkey - 1)->time;
01912     dval= (end - sta) / (float)(data->totrekey - 1);
01913 
01914     /* interpolate new keys from old ones */
01915     for (k=1,key++; k<data->totrekey-1; k++,key++) {
01916         state.time= (float)k / (float)(data->totrekey-1);
01917         psys_get_particle_on_path(&sim, pa_index, &state, 0);
01918         copy_v3_v3(key->co, state.co);
01919         key->time= sta + k * dval;
01920     }
01921 
01922     /* replace keys */
01923     if (pa->hair)
01924         MEM_freeN(pa->hair);
01925     pa->hair= new_keys;
01926 
01927     point->totkey=pa->totkey=data->totrekey;
01928 
01929 
01930     if (point->keys)
01931         MEM_freeN(point->keys);
01932     ekey= point->keys= MEM_callocN(pa->totkey * sizeof(PTCacheEditKey),"Hair re-key edit keys");
01933         
01934     for (k=0, key=pa->hair; k<pa->totkey; k++, key++, ekey++) {
01935         ekey->co= key->co;
01936         ekey->time= &key->time;
01937         ekey->flag |= PEK_SELECT;
01938         if (!(psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR))
01939             ekey->flag |= PEK_USE_WCO;
01940     }
01941 
01942     pa->flag &= ~PARS_REKEY;
01943     point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
01944 }
01945 
01946 static int rekey_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01947 {
01948     PEData data;
01949 
01950     PE_set_data(C, &data);
01951 
01952     data.dval= 1.0f / (float)(data.totrekey-1);
01953     data.totrekey= RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "keys");
01954 
01955     foreach_selected_point(&data, rekey_particle);
01956     
01957     recalc_lengths(data.edit);
01958     PE_update_object(data.scene, data.ob, 1);
01959     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_EDITED, data.ob);
01960 
01961     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01962 }
01963 
01964 void PARTICLE_OT_rekey(wmOperatorType *ot)
01965 {
01966     /* identifiers */
01967     ot->name = "Rekey";
01968     ot->idname = "PARTICLE_OT_rekey";
01969     
01970     /* api callbacks */
01971     ot->exec = rekey_exec;
01972     ot->invoke = WM_operator_props_popup;
01973     ot->poll = PE_hair_poll;
01974 
01975     /* flags */
01976     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01977 
01978     /* properties */
01979     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "keys", 2, 2, INT_MAX, "Number of Keys", "", 2, 100);
01980 }
01981 
01982 static void rekey_particle_to_time(Scene *scene, Object *ob, int pa_index, float path_time)
01983 {
01984     PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, ob);
01985     ParticleSystem *psys;
01986     ParticleSimulationData sim= {0};
01987     ParticleData *pa;
01988     ParticleKey state;
01989     HairKey *new_keys, *key;
01990     PTCacheEditKey *ekey;
01991     int k;
01992 
01993     if (!edit || !edit->psys) return;
01994 
01995     psys = edit->psys;
01996 
01997     sim.scene= scene;
01998     sim.ob= ob;
01999     sim.psys= psys;
02000 
02001     pa= psys->particles + pa_index;
02002 
02003     pa->flag |= PARS_REKEY;
02004 
02005     key= new_keys= MEM_dupallocN(pa->hair);
02006     
02007     /* interpolate new keys from old ones (roots stay the same) */
02008     for (k=1, key++; k < pa->totkey; k++, key++) {
02009         state.time= path_time * (float)k / (float)(pa->totkey-1);
02010         psys_get_particle_on_path(&sim, pa_index, &state, 0);
02011         copy_v3_v3(key->co, state.co);
02012     }
02013 
02014     /* replace hair keys */
02015     if (pa->hair)
02016         MEM_freeN(pa->hair);
02017     pa->hair= new_keys;
02018 
02019     /* update edit pointers */
02020     for (k=0, key=pa->hair, ekey=edit->points[pa_index].keys; k<pa->totkey; k++, key++, ekey++) {
02021         ekey->co= key->co;
02022         ekey->time= &key->time;
02023     }
02024 
02025     pa->flag &= ~PARS_REKEY;
02026 }
02027 
02028 /************************* utilities **************************/
02029 
02030 static int remove_tagged_particles(Object *ob, ParticleSystem *psys, int mirror)
02031 {
02032     PTCacheEdit *edit = psys->edit;
02033     ParticleData *pa, *npa=0, *new_pars=0;
02034     POINT_P;
02035     PTCacheEditPoint *npoint=0, *new_points=0;
02036     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd;
02037     int i, new_totpart= psys->totpart, removed= 0;
02038 
02039     if (mirror) {
02040         /* mirror tags */
02041         psmd= psys_get_modifier(ob, psys);
02042 
02043         LOOP_TAGGED_POINTS {
02044             PE_mirror_particle(ob, psmd->dm, psys, psys->particles + p, NULL);
02045         }
02046     }
02047 
02048     LOOP_TAGGED_POINTS {
02049         new_totpart--;
02050         removed++;
02051     }
02052 
02053     if (new_totpart != psys->totpart) {
02054         if (new_totpart) {
02055             npa= new_pars= MEM_callocN(new_totpart * sizeof(ParticleData), "ParticleData array");
02056             npoint= new_points= MEM_callocN(new_totpart * sizeof(PTCacheEditPoint), "PTCacheEditKey array");
02057 
02058             if (ELEM(NULL, new_pars, new_points)) {
02059                  /* allocation error! */
02060                 if (new_pars)
02061                     MEM_freeN(new_pars);
02062                 if (new_points)
02063                     MEM_freeN(new_points);
02064                 return 0;
02065             }
02066         }
02067 
02068         pa= psys->particles;
02069         point= edit->points;
02070         for (i=0; i<psys->totpart; i++, pa++, point++) {
02071             if (point->flag & PEP_TAG) {
02072                 if (point->keys)
02073                     MEM_freeN(point->keys);
02074                 if (pa->hair)
02075                     MEM_freeN(pa->hair);
02076             }
02077             else {
02078                 memcpy(npa, pa, sizeof(ParticleData));
02079                 memcpy(npoint, point, sizeof(PTCacheEditPoint));
02080                 npa++;
02081                 npoint++;
02082             }
02083         }
02084 
02085         if (psys->particles) MEM_freeN(psys->particles);
02086         psys->particles= new_pars;
02087 
02088         if (edit->points) MEM_freeN(edit->points);
02089         edit->points= new_points;
02090 
02091         if (edit->mirror_cache) {
02092             MEM_freeN(edit->mirror_cache);
02093             edit->mirror_cache= NULL;
02094         }
02095 
02096         if (psys->child) {
02097             MEM_freeN(psys->child);
02098             psys->child= NULL;
02099             psys->totchild=0;
02100         }
02101 
02102         edit->totpoint= psys->totpart= new_totpart;
02103     }
02104 
02105     return removed;
02106 }
02107 
02108 static void remove_tagged_keys(Object *ob, ParticleSystem *psys)
02109 {
02110     PTCacheEdit *edit= psys->edit;
02111     ParticleData *pa;
02112     HairKey *hkey, *nhkey, *new_hkeys=0;
02113     POINT_P; KEY_K;
02114     PTCacheEditKey *nkey, *new_keys;
02115     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd;
02116     short new_totkey;
02117 
02118     if (pe_x_mirror(ob)) {
02119         /* mirror key tags */
02120         psmd= psys_get_modifier(ob, psys);
02121 
02122         LOOP_POINTS {
02123             LOOP_TAGGED_KEYS {
02124                 PE_mirror_particle(ob, psmd->dm, psys, psys->particles + p, NULL);
02125                 break;
02126             }
02127         }
02128     }
02129 
02130     LOOP_POINTS {
02131         new_totkey= point->totkey;
02132         LOOP_TAGGED_KEYS {
02133             new_totkey--;
02134         }
02135         /* we can't have elements with less than two keys*/
02136         if (new_totkey < 2)
02137             point->flag |= PEP_TAG;
02138     }
02139     remove_tagged_particles(ob, psys, pe_x_mirror(ob));
02140 
02141     LOOP_POINTS {
02142         pa = psys->particles + p;
02143         new_totkey= pa->totkey;
02144 
02145         LOOP_TAGGED_KEYS {
02146             new_totkey--;
02147         }
02148 
02149         if (new_totkey != pa->totkey) {
02150             nhkey= new_hkeys= MEM_callocN(new_totkey*sizeof(HairKey), "HairKeys");
02151             nkey= new_keys= MEM_callocN(new_totkey*sizeof(PTCacheEditKey), "particle edit keys");
02152 
02153             hkey= pa->hair;
02154             LOOP_KEYS {
02155                 while (key->flag & PEK_TAG && hkey < pa->hair + pa->totkey) {
02156                     key++;
02157                     hkey++;
02158                 }
02159 
02160                 if (hkey < pa->hair + pa->totkey) {
02161                     copy_v3_v3(nhkey->co, hkey->co);
02162                     nhkey->editflag = hkey->editflag;
02163                     nhkey->time= hkey->time;
02164                     nhkey->weight= hkey->weight;
02165                     
02166                     nkey->co= nhkey->co;
02167                     nkey->time= &nhkey->time;
02168                     /* these can be copied from old edit keys */
02169                     nkey->flag = key->flag;
02170                     nkey->ftime = key->ftime;
02171                     nkey->length = key->length;
02172                     copy_v3_v3(nkey->world_co, key->world_co);
02173                 }
02174                 nkey++;
02175                 nhkey++;
02176                 hkey++;
02177             }
02178 
02179             if (pa->hair)
02180                 MEM_freeN(pa->hair);
02181 
02182             if (point->keys)
02183                 MEM_freeN(point->keys);
02184             
02185             pa->hair= new_hkeys;
02186             point->keys= new_keys;
02187 
02188             point->totkey= pa->totkey= new_totkey;
02189 
02190             /* flag for recalculating length */
02191             point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
02192         }
02193     }
02194 }
02195 
02196 /************************ subdivide opertor *********************/
02197 
02198 /* works like normal edit mode subdivide, inserts keys between neighboring selected keys */
02199 static void subdivide_particle(PEData *data, int pa_index)
02200 {
02201     PTCacheEdit *edit= data->edit;
02202     ParticleSystem *psys= edit->psys;
02203     ParticleSimulationData sim= {0};
02204     ParticleData *pa= psys->particles + pa_index;
02205     PTCacheEditPoint *point = edit->points + pa_index;
02206     ParticleKey state;
02207     HairKey *key, *nkey, *new_keys;
02208     PTCacheEditKey *ekey, *nekey, *new_ekeys;
02209 
02210     int k;
02211     short totnewkey=0;
02212     float endtime;
02213 
02214     sim.scene= data->scene;
02215     sim.ob= data->ob;
02216     sim.psys= edit->psys;
02217 
02218     for (k=0, ekey=point->keys; k<pa->totkey-1; k++,ekey++) {
02219         if (ekey->flag&PEK_SELECT && (ekey+1)->flag&PEK_SELECT)
02220             totnewkey++;
02221     }
02222 
02223     if (totnewkey==0) return;
02224 
02225     pa->flag |= PARS_REKEY;
02226 
02227     nkey= new_keys= MEM_callocN((pa->totkey+totnewkey)*(sizeof(HairKey)),"Hair subdivide keys");
02228     nekey= new_ekeys= MEM_callocN((pa->totkey+totnewkey)*(sizeof(PTCacheEditKey)),"Hair subdivide edit keys");
02229     
02230     key = pa->hair;
02231     endtime= key[pa->totkey-1].time;
02232 
02233     for (k=0, ekey=point->keys; k<pa->totkey-1; k++, key++, ekey++) {
02234 
02235         memcpy(nkey,key,sizeof(HairKey));
02236         memcpy(nekey,ekey,sizeof(PTCacheEditKey));
02237 
02238         nekey->co= nkey->co;
02239         nekey->time= &nkey->time;
02240 
02241         nkey++;
02242         nekey++;
02243 
02244         if (ekey->flag & PEK_SELECT && (ekey+1)->flag & PEK_SELECT) {
02245             nkey->time= (key->time + (key+1)->time)*0.5f;
02246             state.time= (endtime != 0.0f)? nkey->time/endtime: 0.0f;
02247             psys_get_particle_on_path(&sim, pa_index, &state, 0);
02248             copy_v3_v3(nkey->co, state.co);
02249 
02250             nekey->co= nkey->co;
02251             nekey->time= &nkey->time;
02252             nekey->flag |= PEK_SELECT;
02253             if (!(psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR))
02254                 nekey->flag |= PEK_USE_WCO;
02255 
02256             nekey++;
02257             nkey++;
02258         }
02259     }
02260     /*tip still not copied*/
02261     memcpy(nkey,key,sizeof(HairKey));
02262     memcpy(nekey,ekey,sizeof(PTCacheEditKey));
02263 
02264     nekey->co= nkey->co;
02265     nekey->time= &nkey->time;
02266 
02267     if (pa->hair)
02268         MEM_freeN(pa->hair);
02269     pa->hair= new_keys;
02270 
02271     if (point->keys)
02272         MEM_freeN(point->keys);
02273     point->keys= new_ekeys;
02274 
02275     point->totkey = pa->totkey = pa->totkey + totnewkey;
02276     point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
02277     pa->flag &= ~PARS_REKEY;
02278 }
02279 
02280 static int subdivide_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
02281 {
02282     PEData data;
02283 
02284     PE_set_data(C, &data);
02285     foreach_point(&data, subdivide_particle);
02286     
02287     recalc_lengths(data.edit);
02288     PE_update_object(data.scene, data.ob, 1);
02289     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_EDITED, data.ob);
02290 
02291     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02292 }
02293 
02294 void PARTICLE_OT_subdivide(wmOperatorType *ot)
02295 {
02296     /* identifiers */
02297     ot->name = "Subdivide";
02298     ot->idname = "PARTICLE_OT_subdivide";
02299     
02300     /* api callbacks */
02301     ot->exec = subdivide_exec;
02302     ot->poll = PE_hair_poll;
02303 
02304     /* flags */
02305     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
02306 }
02307 
02308 /************************ remove doubles opertor *********************/
02309 
02310 static int remove_doubles_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02311 {
02312     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
02313     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
02314     PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, ob);
02315     ParticleSystem *psys = edit->psys;
02316     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd;
02317     KDTree *tree;
02318     KDTreeNearest nearest[10];
02319     POINT_P;
02320     float mat[4][4], co[3], threshold= RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "threshold");
02321     int n, totn, removed, totremoved;
02322 
02323     if (psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR)
02324         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02325 
02326     edit= psys->edit;
02327     psmd= psys_get_modifier(ob, psys);
02328     totremoved= 0;
02329 
02330     do {
02331         removed= 0;
02332 
02333         tree=BLI_kdtree_new(psys->totpart);
02334             
02335         /* insert particles into kd tree */
02336         LOOP_SELECTED_POINTS {
02337             psys_mat_hair_to_object(ob, psmd->dm, psys->part->from, psys->particles+p, mat);
02338             copy_v3_v3(co, point->keys->co);
02339             mul_m4_v3(mat, co);
02340             BLI_kdtree_insert(tree, p, co, NULL);
02341         }
02342 
02343         BLI_kdtree_balance(tree);
02344 
02345         /* tag particles to be removed */
02346         LOOP_SELECTED_POINTS {
02347             psys_mat_hair_to_object(ob, psmd->dm, psys->part->from, psys->particles+p, mat);
02348             copy_v3_v3(co, point->keys->co);
02349             mul_m4_v3(mat, co);
02350 
02351             totn= BLI_kdtree_find_n_nearest(tree,10,co,NULL,nearest);
02352 
02353             for (n=0; n<totn; n++) {
02354                 /* this needs a custom threshold still */
02355                 if (nearest[n].index > p && nearest[n].dist < threshold) {
02356                     if (!(point->flag & PEP_TAG)) {
02357                         point->flag |= PEP_TAG;
02358                         removed++;
02359                     }
02360                 }
02361             }
02362         }
02363 
02364         BLI_kdtree_free(tree);
02365 
02366         /* remove tagged particles - don't do mirror here! */
02367         remove_tagged_particles(ob, psys, 0);
02368         totremoved += removed;
02369     } while (removed);
02370 
02371     if (totremoved == 0)
02372         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02373 
02374     BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_INFO, "Remove %d double particles", totremoved);
02375 
02376     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
02377     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_EDITED, ob);
02378 
02379     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02380 }
02381 
02382 void PARTICLE_OT_remove_doubles(wmOperatorType *ot)
02383 {
02384     /* identifiers */
02385     ot->name = "Remove Doubles";
02386     ot->idname = "PARTICLE_OT_remove_doubles";
02387     
02388     /* api callbacks */
02389     ot->exec = remove_doubles_exec;
02390     ot->poll = PE_hair_poll;
02391 
02392     /* flags */
02393     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
02394 
02395     /* properties */
02396     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "threshold", 0.0002f, 0.0f, FLT_MAX, "Threshold", "Threshold distance withing which particles are removed", 0.00001f, 0.1f);
02397 }
02398 
02399 
02400 static int weight_set_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02401 {
02402     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
02403     ParticleEditSettings *pset= PE_settings(scene);
02404     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
02405     PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, ob);
02406     ParticleSystem *psys = edit->psys;
02407     POINT_P;
02408     KEY_K;
02409     HairKey *hkey;
02410     float weight;
02411     ParticleBrushData *brush= &pset->brush[pset->brushtype];
02412     float factor= RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "factor");
02413 
02414     weight= brush->strength;
02415     edit= psys->edit;
02416 
02417     LOOP_SELECTED_POINTS {
02418         ParticleData *pa= psys->particles + p;
02419 
02420         LOOP_SELECTED_KEYS {
02421             hkey= pa->hair + k;
02422             hkey->weight= interpf(weight, hkey->weight, factor);
02423         }
02424     }
02425 
02426     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
02427     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_EDITED, ob);
02428 
02429     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02430 }
02431 
02432 void PARTICLE_OT_weight_set(wmOperatorType *ot)
02433 {
02434     /* identifiers */
02435     ot->name = "Weight Set";
02436     ot->idname = "PARTICLE_OT_weight_set";
02437 
02438     /* api callbacks */
02439     ot->exec = weight_set_exec;
02440     ot->poll = PE_hair_poll;
02441 
02442     /* flags */
02443     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
02444 
02445     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "factor", 1, 0, 1, "Factor", "", 0, 1);
02446 }
02447 
02448 /************************ cursor drawing *******************************/
02449 
02450 static void brush_drawcursor(bContext *C, int x, int y, void *UNUSED(customdata))
02451 {
02452     ParticleEditSettings *pset= PE_settings(CTX_data_scene(C));
02453     ParticleBrushData *brush;
02454 
02455     if (pset->brushtype < 0)
02456         return;
02457 
02458     brush= &pset->brush[pset->brushtype];
02459 
02460     if (brush) {
02461         glPushMatrix();
02462 
02463         glTranslatef((float)x, (float)y, 0.0f);
02464 
02465         glColor4ub(255, 255, 255, 128);
02466         glEnable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH );
02467         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
02468         glutil_draw_lined_arc(0.0, M_PI*2.0, brush->size, 40);
02469         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
02470         glDisable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH );
02471         
02472         glPopMatrix();
02473     }
02474 }
02475 
02476 static void toggle_particle_cursor(bContext *C, int enable)
02477 {
02478     ParticleEditSettings *pset= PE_settings(CTX_data_scene(C));
02479 
02480     if (pset->paintcursor && !enable) {
02481         WM_paint_cursor_end(CTX_wm_manager(C), pset->paintcursor);
02482         pset->paintcursor = NULL;
02483     }
02484     else if (enable)
02485         pset->paintcursor= WM_paint_cursor_activate(CTX_wm_manager(C), PE_poll_view3d, brush_drawcursor, NULL);
02486 }
02487 
02488 /*************************** delete operator **************************/
02489 
02490 enum { DEL_PARTICLE, DEL_KEY };
02491 
02492 static EnumPropertyItem delete_type_items[]= {
02493     {DEL_PARTICLE, "PARTICLE", 0, "Particle", ""},
02494     {DEL_KEY, "KEY", 0, "Key", ""},
02495     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
02496 
02497 static void set_delete_particle(PEData *data, int pa_index)
02498 {
02499     PTCacheEdit *edit= data->edit;
02500 
02501     edit->points[pa_index].flag |= PEP_TAG;
02502 }
02503 
02504 static void set_delete_particle_key(PEData *data, int pa_index, int key_index)
02505 {
02506     PTCacheEdit *edit= data->edit;
02507 
02508     edit->points[pa_index].keys[key_index].flag |= PEK_TAG;
02509 }
02510 
02511 static int delete_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02512 {
02513     PEData data;
02514     int type= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
02515 
02516     PE_set_data(C, &data);
02517 
02518     if (type == DEL_KEY) {
02519         foreach_selected_key(&data, set_delete_particle_key);
02520         remove_tagged_keys(data.ob, data.edit->psys);
02521         recalc_lengths(data.edit);
02522     }
02523     else if (type == DEL_PARTICLE) {
02524         foreach_selected_point(&data, set_delete_particle);
02525         remove_tagged_particles(data.ob, data.edit->psys, pe_x_mirror(data.ob));
02526         recalc_lengths(data.edit);
02527     }
02528 
02529     DAG_id_tag_update(&data.ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
02530     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_EDITED, data.ob);
02531 
02532     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02533 }
02534 
02535 void PARTICLE_OT_delete(wmOperatorType *ot)
02536 {
02537     /* identifiers */
02538     ot->name = "Delete";
02539     ot->idname = "PARTICLE_OT_delete";
02540     
02541     /* api callbacks */
02542     ot->exec = delete_exec;
02543     ot->invoke = WM_menu_invoke;
02544     ot->poll = PE_hair_poll;
02545 
02546     /* flags */
02547     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
02548 
02549     /* properties */
02550     ot->prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", delete_type_items, DEL_PARTICLE, "Type", "Delete a full particle or only keys");
02551 }
02552 
02553 /*************************** mirror operator **************************/
02554 
02555 static void PE_mirror_x(Scene *scene, Object *ob, int tagged)
02556 {
02557     Mesh *me= (Mesh*)(ob->data);
02558     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd;
02559     PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, ob);
02560     ParticleSystem *psys = edit->psys;
02561     ParticleData *pa, *newpa, *new_pars;
02562     PTCacheEditPoint *newpoint, *new_points;
02563     POINT_P; KEY_K;
02564     HairKey *hkey;
02565     int *mirrorfaces = NULL;
02566     int rotation, totpart, newtotpart;
02567 
02568     if (psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR)
02569         return;
02570 
02571     psmd= psys_get_modifier(ob, psys);
02572     if (!psmd->dm)
02573         return;
02574 
02575     /* NOTE: this is not nice to use tessfaces but hard to avoid since pa->num uses tessfaces */
02576     BKE_mesh_tessface_ensure(me);
02577 
02578     mirrorfaces= mesh_get_x_mirror_faces(ob, NULL);
02579 
02580     if (!edit->mirror_cache)
02581         PE_update_mirror_cache(ob, psys);
02582 
02583     totpart= psys->totpart;
02584     newtotpart= psys->totpart;
02585     LOOP_VISIBLE_POINTS {
02586         pa = psys->particles + p;
02587         if (!tagged) {
02588             if (point_is_selected(point)) {
02589                 if (edit->mirror_cache[p] != -1) {
02590                     /* already has a mirror, don't need to duplicate */
02591                     PE_mirror_particle(ob, psmd->dm, psys, pa, NULL);
02592                     continue;
02593                 }
02594                 else
02595                     point->flag |= PEP_TAG;
02596             }
02597         }
02598 
02599         if ((point->flag & PEP_TAG) && mirrorfaces[pa->num*2] != -1)
02600             newtotpart++;
02601     }
02602 
02603     if (newtotpart != psys->totpart) {
02604         /* allocate new arrays and copy existing */
02605         new_pars= MEM_callocN(newtotpart*sizeof(ParticleData), "ParticleData new");
02606         new_points= MEM_callocN(newtotpart*sizeof(PTCacheEditPoint), "PTCacheEditPoint new");
02607 
02608         if (psys->particles) {
02609             memcpy(new_pars, psys->particles, totpart*sizeof(ParticleData));
02610             MEM_freeN(psys->particles);
02611         }
02612         psys->particles= new_pars;
02613 
02614         if (edit->points) {
02615             memcpy(new_points, edit->points, totpart*sizeof(PTCacheEditPoint));
02616             MEM_freeN(edit->points);
02617         }
02618         edit->points= new_points;
02619 
02620         if (edit->mirror_cache) {
02621             MEM_freeN(edit->mirror_cache);
02622             edit->mirror_cache= NULL;
02623         }
02624 
02625         edit->totpoint= psys->totpart= newtotpart;
02626
