02627         /* create new elements */
02628         newpa= psys->particles + totpart;
02629         newpoint= edit->points + totpart;
02630 
02631         for (p=0, point=edit->points; p<totpart; p++, point++) {
02632             pa = psys->particles + p;
02633 
02634             if (point->flag & PEP_HIDE)
02635                 continue;
02636             if (!(point->flag & PEP_TAG) || mirrorfaces[pa->num*2] == -1)
02637                 continue;
02638 
02639             /* duplicate */
02640             *newpa= *pa;
02641             *newpoint= *point;
02642             if (pa->hair) newpa->hair= MEM_dupallocN(pa->hair);
02643             if (point->keys) newpoint->keys= MEM_dupallocN(point->keys);
02644 
02645             /* rotate weights according to vertex index rotation */
02646             rotation= mirrorfaces[pa->num*2+1];
02647             newpa->fuv[0]= pa->fuv[2];
02648             newpa->fuv[1]= pa->fuv[1];
02649             newpa->fuv[2]= pa->fuv[0];
02650             newpa->fuv[3]= pa->fuv[3];
02651             while (rotation-- > 0)
02652                 if (me->mface[pa->num].v4) {
02653                     SHIFT4(float, newpa->fuv[0], newpa->fuv[1], newpa->fuv[2], newpa->fuv[3]);
02654                 }
02655                 else {
02656                     SHIFT3(float, newpa->fuv[0], newpa->fuv[1], newpa->fuv[2]);
02657                 }
02658 
02659             /* assign face inddex */
02660             newpa->num= mirrorfaces[pa->num*2];
02661             newpa->num_dmcache= psys_particle_dm_face_lookup(ob,psmd->dm,newpa->num,newpa->fuv, NULL);
02662 
02663             /* update edit key pointers */
02664             key= newpoint->keys;
02665             for (k=0, hkey=newpa->hair; k<newpa->totkey; k++, hkey++, key++) {
02666                 key->co= hkey->co;
02667                 key->time= &hkey->time;
02668             }
02669 
02670             /* map key positions as mirror over x axis */
02671             PE_mirror_particle(ob, psmd->dm, psys, pa, newpa);
02672 
02673             newpa++;
02674             newpoint++;
02675         }
02676     }
02677 
02678     LOOP_POINTS {
02679         point->flag &= ~PEP_TAG;
02680     }
02681 
02682     MEM_freeN(mirrorfaces);
02683 }
02684 
02685 static int mirror_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
02686 {
02687     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
02688     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
02689     PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, ob);
02690     
02691     PE_mirror_x(scene, ob, 0);
02692 
02693     update_world_cos(ob, edit);
02694     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_EDITED, ob);
02695     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
02696 
02697     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02698 }
02699 
02700 void PARTICLE_OT_mirror(wmOperatorType *ot)
02701 {
02702     /* identifiers */
02703     ot->name = "Mirror";
02704     ot->idname = "PARTICLE_OT_mirror";
02705     
02706     /* api callbacks */
02707     ot->exec = mirror_exec;
02708     ot->poll = PE_hair_poll;
02709 
02710     /* flags */
02711     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
02712 }
02713 
02714 /************************* brush edit callbacks ********************/
02715 
02716 static void brush_comb(PEData *data, float UNUSED(mat[][4]), float imat[][4], int point_index, int key_index, PTCacheEditKey *key)
02717 {
02718     ParticleEditSettings *pset= PE_settings(data->scene);
02719     float cvec[3], fac;
02720 
02721     if (pset->flag & PE_LOCK_FIRST && key_index == 0) return;
02722 
02723     fac= (float)pow((double)(1.0f - data->dist / data->rad), (double)data->combfac);
02724 
02725     copy_v3_v3(cvec,data->dvec);
02726     mul_mat3_m4_v3(imat,cvec);
02727     mul_v3_fl(cvec, fac);
02728     add_v3_v3(key->co, cvec);
02729 
02730     (data->edit->points + point_index)->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
02731 }
02732 
02733 static void brush_cut(PEData *data, int pa_index)
02734 {
02735     PTCacheEdit *edit = data->edit;
02736     ARegion *ar= data->vc.ar;
02737     Object *ob= data->ob;
02738     ParticleEditSettings *pset= PE_settings(data->scene);
02739     ParticleCacheKey *key= edit->pathcache[pa_index];
02740     float rad2, cut_time= 1.0;
02741     float x0, x1, v0, v1, o0, o1, xo0, xo1, d, dv;
02742     int k, cut, keys= (int)pow(2.0, (double)pset->draw_step);
02743     int vertco[2];
02744 
02745     /* blunt scissors */
02746     if (BLI_frand() > data->cutfac) return;
02747 
02748     /* don't cut hidden */
02749     if (edit->points[pa_index].flag & PEP_HIDE)
02750         return;
02751 
02752     rad2= data->rad * data->rad;
02753 
02754     cut=0;
02755 
02756     project_int_noclip(ar, key->co, vertco);
02757     x0= (float)vertco[0];
02758     x1= (float)vertco[1];
02759 
02760     o0= (float)data->mval[0];
02761     o1= (float)data->mval[1];
02762     
02763     xo0= x0 - o0;
02764     xo1= x1 - o1;
02765 
02766     /* check if root is inside circle */
02767     if (xo0*xo0 + xo1*xo1 < rad2 && key_test_depth(data, key->co)) {
02768         cut_time= -1.0f;
02769         cut= 1;
02770     }
02771     else {
02772         /* calculate path time closest to root that was inside the circle */
02773         for (k=1, key++; k<=keys; k++, key++) {
02774             project_int_noclip(ar, key->co, vertco);
02775 
02776             if (key_test_depth(data, key->co) == 0) {
02777                 x0= (float)vertco[0];
02778                 x1= (float)vertco[1];
02779 
02780                 xo0= x0 - o0;
02781                 xo1= x1 - o1;
02782                 continue;
02783             }
02784 
02785             v0= (float)vertco[0] - x0;
02786             v1= (float)vertco[1] - x1;
02787 
02788             dv= v0*v0 + v1*v1;
02789 
02790             d= (v0*xo1 - v1*xo0);
02791             
02792             d= dv * rad2 - d*d;
02793 
02794             if (d > 0.0f) {
02795                 d= sqrt(d);
02796 
02797                 cut_time= -(v0*xo0 + v1*xo1 + d);
02798 
02799                 if (cut_time > 0.0f) {
02800                     cut_time /= dv;
02801 
02802                     if (cut_time < 1.0f) {
02803                         cut_time += (float)(k-1);
02804                         cut_time /= (float)keys;
02805                         cut= 1;
02806                         break;
02807                     }
02808                 }
02809             }
02810 
02811             x0= (float)vertco[0];
02812             x1= (float)vertco[1];
02813 
02814             xo0= x0 - o0;
02815             xo1= x1 - o1;
02816         }
02817     }
02818 
02819     if (cut) {
02820         if (cut_time < 0.0f) {
02821             edit->points[pa_index].flag |= PEP_TAG;
02822         }
02823         else {
02824             rekey_particle_to_time(data->scene, ob, pa_index, cut_time);
02825             edit->points[pa_index].flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
02826         }
02827     }
02828 }
02829 
02830 static void brush_length(PEData *data, int point_index)
02831 {
02832     PTCacheEdit *edit= data->edit;
02833     PTCacheEditPoint *point = edit->points + point_index;
02834     KEY_K;
02835     float dvec[3],pvec[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
02836 
02837     LOOP_KEYS {
02838         if (k==0) {
02839             copy_v3_v3(pvec,key->co);
02840         }
02841         else {
02842             sub_v3_v3v3(dvec,key->co,pvec);
02843             copy_v3_v3(pvec,key->co);
02844             mul_v3_fl(dvec,data->growfac);
02845             add_v3_v3v3(key->co,(key-1)->co,dvec);
02846         }
02847     }
02848 
02849     point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
02850 }
02851 
02852 static void brush_puff(PEData *data, int point_index)
02853 {
02854     PTCacheEdit *edit = data->edit;
02855     ParticleSystem *psys = edit->psys;
02856     PTCacheEditPoint *point = edit->points + point_index;
02857     KEY_K;
02858     float mat[4][4], imat[4][4];
02859 
02860     float lastco[3], rootco[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, co[3], nor[3], kco[3], dco[3], ofs[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, fac=0.0f, length=0.0f;
02861     int puff_volume = 0;
02862     int change= 0;
02863 
02864     {
02865         ParticleEditSettings *pset= PE_settings(data->scene);
02866         ParticleBrushData *brush= &pset->brush[pset->brushtype];
02867         puff_volume = brush->flag & PE_BRUSH_DATA_PUFF_VOLUME;
02868     }
02869 
02870     if (psys && !(psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR)) {
02871         psys_mat_hair_to_global(data->ob, data->dm, psys->part->from, psys->particles + point_index, mat);
02872         invert_m4_m4(imat,mat);
02873     }
02874     else {
02875         unit_m4(mat);
02876         unit_m4(imat);
02877     }
02878 
02879     LOOP_KEYS {
02880         if (k==0) {
02881             /* find root coordinate and normal on emitter */
02882             copy_v3_v3(co, key->co);
02883             mul_m4_v3(mat, co);
02884             mul_v3_m4v3(kco, data->ob->imat, co); /* use 'kco' as the object space version of worldspace 'co', ob->imat is set before calling */
02885 
02886             point_index= BLI_kdtree_find_nearest(edit->emitter_field, kco, NULL, NULL);
02887             if (point_index == -1) return;
02888 
02889             copy_v3_v3(rootco, co);
02890             copy_v3_v3(nor, &edit->emitter_cosnos[point_index*6+3]);
02891             mul_mat3_m4_v3(data->ob->obmat, nor); /* normal into worldspace */
02892 
02893             normalize_v3(nor);
02894             length= 0.0f;
02895 
02896             fac= (float)pow((double)(1.0f - data->dist / data->rad), (double)data->pufffac);
02897             fac *= 0.025f;
02898             if (data->invert)
02899                 fac= -fac;
02900         }
02901         else {
02902             /* compute position as if hair was standing up straight.
02903              * */
02904             copy_v3_v3(lastco, co);
02905             copy_v3_v3(co, key->co);
02906             mul_m4_v3(mat, co);
02907             length += len_v3v3(lastco, co);
02908             if ((data->select==0 || (key->flag & PEK_SELECT)) && !(key->flag & PEK_HIDE)) {
02909                 madd_v3_v3v3fl(kco, rootco, nor, length);
02910 
02911                 /* blend between the current and straight position */
02912                 sub_v3_v3v3(dco, kco, co);
02913                 madd_v3_v3fl(co, dco, fac);
02914 
02915                 /* re-use dco to compare before and after translation and add to the offset  */
02916                 copy_v3_v3(dco, key->co);
02917 
02918                 mul_v3_m4v3(key->co, imat, co);
02919 
02920                 if (puff_volume) {
02921                     /* accumulate the total distance moved to apply to unselected
02922                      * keys that come after */
02923                     ofs[0] += key->co[0] - dco[0];
02924                     ofs[1] += key->co[1] - dco[1];
02925                     ofs[2] += key->co[2] - dco[2];
02926                 }
02927                 change = 1;
02928             }
02929             else {
02930 
02931                 if (puff_volume) {
02932 #if 0
02933                     /* this is simple but looks bad, adds annoying kinks */
02934                     add_v3_v3(key->co, ofs);
02935 #else
02936                     /* translate (not rotate) the rest of the hair if its not selected  */
02937                     if (ofs[0] || ofs[1] || ofs[2]) {
02938 #if 0                   /* kindof works but looks worse then whats below */
02939 
02940                         /* Move the unselected point on a vector based on the
02941                          * hair direction and the offset */
02942                         float c1[3], c2[3];
02943                         sub_v3_v3v3(dco, lastco, co);
02944                         mul_mat3_m4_v3(imat, dco); /* into particle space */
02945 
02946                         /* move the point along a vector perpendicular to the
02947                          * hairs direction, reduces odd kinks, */
02948                         cross_v3_v3v3(c1, ofs, dco);
02949                         cross_v3_v3v3(c2, c1, dco);
02950                         normalize_v3(c2);
02951                         mul_v3_fl(c2, len_v3(ofs));
02952                         add_v3_v3(key->co, c2);
02953 #else
02954                         /* Move the unselected point on a vector based on the
02955                          * the normal of the closest geometry */
02956                         float oco[3], onor[3];
02957                         copy_v3_v3(oco, key->co);
02958                         mul_m4_v3(mat, oco);
02959                         mul_v3_m4v3(kco, data->ob->imat, oco); /* use 'kco' as the object space version of worldspace 'co', ob->imat is set before calling */
02960 
02961                         point_index= BLI_kdtree_find_nearest(edit->emitter_field, kco, NULL, NULL);
02962                         if (point_index != -1) {
02963                             copy_v3_v3(onor, &edit->emitter_cosnos[point_index*6+3]);
02964                             mul_mat3_m4_v3(data->ob->obmat, onor); /* normal into worldspace */
02965                             mul_mat3_m4_v3(imat, onor); /* worldspace into particle space */
02966                             normalize_v3(onor);
02967 
02968 
02969                             mul_v3_fl(onor, len_v3(ofs));
02970                             add_v3_v3(key->co, onor);
02971                         }
02972 #endif
02973                     }
02974 #endif
02975                 }
02976             }
02977         }
02978     }
02979 
02980     if (change)
02981         point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
02982 }
02983 
02984 
02985 static void brush_weight(PEData *data, float UNUSED(mat[][4]), float UNUSED(imat[][4]), int point_index, int key_index, PTCacheEditKey *UNUSED(key))
02986 {
02987     /* roots have full weight allways */
02988     if (key_index) {
02989         PTCacheEdit *edit = data->edit;
02990         ParticleSystem *psys = edit->psys;
02991 
02992         ParticleData *pa= psys->particles + point_index;
02993         pa->hair[key_index].weight = data->weightfac;
02994 
02995         (data->edit->points + point_index)->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
02996     }
02997 }
02998 
02999 static void brush_smooth_get(PEData *data, float mat[][4], float UNUSED(imat[][4]), int UNUSED(point_index), int key_index, PTCacheEditKey *key)
03000 {   
03001     if (key_index) {
03002         float dvec[3];
03003 
03004         sub_v3_v3v3(dvec,key->co,(key-1)->co);
03005         mul_mat3_m4_v3(mat,dvec);
03006         add_v3_v3(data->vec, dvec);
03007         data->tot++;
03008     }
03009 }
03010 
03011 static void brush_smooth_do(PEData *data, float UNUSED(mat[][4]), float imat[][4], int point_index, int key_index, PTCacheEditKey *key)
03012 {
03013     float vec[3], dvec[3];
03014     
03015     if (key_index) {
03016         copy_v3_v3(vec, data->vec);
03017         mul_mat3_m4_v3(imat,vec);
03018 
03019         sub_v3_v3v3(dvec,key->co,(key-1)->co);
03020 
03021         sub_v3_v3v3(dvec,vec,dvec);
03022         mul_v3_fl(dvec,data->smoothfac);
03023         
03024         add_v3_v3(key->co, dvec);
03025     }
03026 
03027     (data->edit->points + point_index)->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
03028 }
03029 
03030 /* convert from triangle barycentric weights to quad mean value weights */
03031 static void intersect_dm_quad_weights(const float v1[3], const float v2[3], const float v3[3], const float v4[3], float w[4])
03032 {
03033     float co[3], vert[4][3];
03034 
03035     copy_v3_v3(vert[0], v1);
03036     copy_v3_v3(vert[1], v2);
03037     copy_v3_v3(vert[2], v3);
03038     copy_v3_v3(vert[3], v4);
03039 
03040     co[0]= v1[0]*w[0] + v2[0]*w[1] + v3[0]*w[2] + v4[0]*w[3];
03041     co[1]= v1[1]*w[0] + v2[1]*w[1] + v3[1]*w[2] + v4[1]*w[3];
03042     co[2]= v1[2]*w[0] + v2[2]*w[1] + v3[2]*w[2] + v4[2]*w[3];
03043 
03044     interp_weights_poly_v3(w, vert, 4, co);
03045 }
03046 
03047 /* check intersection with a derivedmesh */
03048 static int particle_intersect_dm(Scene *scene, Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm,
03049                                  float *vert_cos,
03050                                  const float co1[3], const float co2[3],
03051                                  float *min_d, int *min_face, float *min_w,
03052                                  float *face_minmax, float *pa_minmax,
03053                                  float radius, float *ipoint)
03054 {
03055     MFace *mface= NULL;
03056     MVert *mvert= NULL;
03057     int i, totface, intersect=0;
03058     float cur_d, cur_uv[2], v1[3], v2[3], v3[3], v4[3], min[3], max[3], p_min[3],p_max[3];
03059     float cur_ipoint[3];
03060     
03061     if (dm == NULL) {
03062         psys_disable_all(ob);
03063 
03064         dm=mesh_get_derived_final(scene, ob, 0);
03065         if (dm == NULL)
03066             dm=mesh_get_derived_deform(scene, ob, 0);
03067 
03068         psys_enable_all(ob);
03069 
03070         if (dm == NULL)
03071             return 0;
03072     }
03073 
03074     /* BMESH_ONLY, deform dm may not have tessface */
03075     DM_ensure_tessface(dm);
03076     
03077 
03078     if (pa_minmax==0) {
03079         INIT_MINMAX(p_min,p_max);
03080         DO_MINMAX(co1,p_min,p_max);
03081         DO_MINMAX(co2,p_min,p_max);
03082     }
03083     else {
03084         copy_v3_v3(p_min,pa_minmax);
03085         copy_v3_v3(p_max,pa_minmax+3);
03086     }
03087 
03088     totface=dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
03089     mface=dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm,CD_MFACE);
03090     mvert=dm->getVertDataArray(dm,CD_MVERT);
03091     
03092     /* lets intersect the faces */
03093     for (i=0; i<totface; i++,mface++) {
03094         if (vert_cos) {
03095             copy_v3_v3(v1,vert_cos+3*mface->v1);
03096             copy_v3_v3(v2,vert_cos+3*mface->v2);
03097             copy_v3_v3(v3,vert_cos+3*mface->v3);
03098             if (mface->v4)
03099                 copy_v3_v3(v4,vert_cos+3*mface->v4);
03100         }
03101         else {
03102             copy_v3_v3(v1,mvert[mface->v1].co);
03103             copy_v3_v3(v2,mvert[mface->v2].co);
03104             copy_v3_v3(v3,mvert[mface->v3].co);
03105             if (mface->v4)
03106                 copy_v3_v3(v4,mvert[mface->v4].co);
03107         }
03108 
03109         if (face_minmax==0) {
03110             INIT_MINMAX(min,max);
03111             DO_MINMAX(v1,min,max);
03112             DO_MINMAX(v2,min,max);
03113             DO_MINMAX(v3,min,max);
03114             if (mface->v4)
03115                 DO_MINMAX(v4, min, max);
03116             if (isect_aabb_aabb_v3(min,max,p_min,p_max)==0)
03117                 continue;
03118         }
03119         else {
03120             copy_v3_v3(min, face_minmax+6*i);
03121             copy_v3_v3(max, face_minmax+6*i+3);
03122             if (isect_aabb_aabb_v3(min,max,p_min,p_max)==0)
03123                 continue;
03124         }
03125 
03126         if (radius>0.0f) {
03127             if (isect_sweeping_sphere_tri_v3(co1, co2, radius, v2, v3, v1, &cur_d, cur_ipoint)) {
03128                 if (cur_d<*min_d) {
03129                     *min_d=cur_d;
03130                     copy_v3_v3(ipoint,cur_ipoint);
03131                     *min_face=i;
03132                     intersect=1;
03133                 }
03134             }
03135             if (mface->v4) {
03136                 if (isect_sweeping_sphere_tri_v3(co1, co2, radius, v4, v1, v3, &cur_d, cur_ipoint)) {
03137                     if (cur_d<*min_d) {
03138                         *min_d=cur_d;
03139                         copy_v3_v3(ipoint,cur_ipoint);
03140                         *min_face=i;
03141                         intersect=1;
03142                     }
03143                 }
03144             }
03145         }
03146         else {
03147             if (isect_line_tri_v3(co1, co2, v1, v2, v3, &cur_d, cur_uv)) {
03148                 if (cur_d<*min_d) {
03149                     *min_d=cur_d;
03150                     min_w[0]= 1.0f - cur_uv[0] - cur_uv[1];
03151                     min_w[1]= cur_uv[0];
03152                     min_w[2]= cur_uv[1];
03153                     min_w[3]= 0.0f;
03154                     if (mface->v4)
03155                         intersect_dm_quad_weights(v1, v2, v3, v4, min_w);
03156                     *min_face=i;
03157                     intersect=1;
03158                 }
03159             }
03160             if (mface->v4) {
03161                 if (isect_line_tri_v3(co1, co2, v1, v3, v4, &cur_d, cur_uv)) {
03162                     if (cur_d<*min_d) {
03163                         *min_d=cur_d;
03164                         min_w[0]= 1.0f - cur_uv[0] - cur_uv[1];
03165                         min_w[1]= 0.0f;
03166                         min_w[2]= cur_uv[0];
03167                         min_w[3]= cur_uv[1];
03168                         intersect_dm_quad_weights(v1, v2, v3, v4, min_w);
03169                         *min_face=i;
03170                         intersect=1;
03171                     }
03172                 }
03173             }
03174         }
03175     }
03176     return intersect;
03177 }
03178 
03179 static int brush_add(PEData *data, short number)
03180 {
03181     Scene *scene= data->scene;
03182     Object *ob= data->ob;
03183     PTCacheEdit *edit = data->edit;
03184     ParticleSystem *psys= edit->psys;
03185     ParticleData *add_pars= MEM_callocN(number*sizeof(ParticleData),"ParticleData add");
03186     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd= psys_get_modifier(ob,psys);
03187     ParticleSimulationData sim= {0};
03188     ParticleEditSettings *pset= PE_settings(scene);
03189     int i, k, n= 0, totpart= psys->totpart;
03190     float mco[2];
03191     short dmx= 0, dmy= 0;
03192     float co1[3], co2[3], min_d, imat[4][4];
03193     float framestep, timestep;
03194     short size= pset->brush[PE_BRUSH_ADD].size;
03195     short size2= size*size;
03196     DerivedMesh *dm=0;
03197     invert_m4_m4(imat,ob->obmat);
03198 
03199     if (psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR)
03200         return 0;
03201 
03202     BLI_srandom(psys->seed+data->mval[0]+data->mval[1]);
03203 
03204     sim.scene= scene;
03205     sim.ob= ob;
03206     sim.psys= psys;
03207     sim.psmd= psmd;
03208 
03209     timestep= psys_get_timestep(&sim);
03210 
03211     /* painting onto the deformed mesh, could be an option? */
03212     if (psmd->dm->deformedOnly)
03213         dm= psmd->dm;
03214     else
03215         dm= mesh_get_derived_deform(scene, ob, CD_MASK_BAREMESH);
03216 
03217     for (i=0; i<number; i++) {
03218         if (number>1) {
03219             dmx=dmy=size;
03220             while (dmx*dmx+dmy*dmy>size2) {
03221                 dmx=(short)((2.0f*BLI_frand()-1.0f)*size);
03222                 dmy=(short)((2.0f*BLI_frand()-1.0f)*size);
03223             }
03224         }
03225 
03226         mco[0]= data->mval[0] + dmx;
03227         mco[1]= data->mval[1] + dmy;
03228         ED_view3d_win_to_segment_clip(data->vc.ar, data->vc.v3d, mco, co1, co2);
03229 
03230         mul_m4_v3(imat,co1);
03231         mul_m4_v3(imat,co2);
03232         min_d=2.0;
03233         
03234         /* warning, returns the derived mesh face */
03235         if (particle_intersect_dm(scene, ob,dm,0,co1,co2,&min_d,&add_pars[n].num,add_pars[n].fuv,0,0,0,0)) {
03236             add_pars[n].num_dmcache= psys_particle_dm_face_lookup(ob,psmd->dm,add_pars[n].num,add_pars[n].fuv,NULL);
03237             n++;
03238         }
03239     }
03240     if (n) {
03241         int newtotpart=totpart+n;
03242         float hairmat[4][4], cur_co[3];
03243         KDTree *tree=0;
03244         ParticleData *pa, *new_pars= MEM_callocN(newtotpart*sizeof(ParticleData),"ParticleData new");
03245         PTCacheEditPoint *point, *new_points= MEM_callocN(newtotpart*sizeof(PTCacheEditPoint),"PTCacheEditPoint array new");
03246         PTCacheEditKey *key;
03247         HairKey *hkey;
03248 
03249         /* save existing elements */
03250         memcpy(new_pars, psys->particles, totpart * sizeof(ParticleData));
03251         memcpy(new_points, edit->points, totpart * sizeof(PTCacheEditPoint));
03252 
03253         /* change old arrays to new ones */
03254         if (psys->particles) MEM_freeN(psys->particles);
03255         psys->particles= new_pars;
03256 
03257         if (edit->points) MEM_freeN(edit->points);
03258         edit->points= new_points;
03259 
03260         if (edit->mirror_cache) {
03261             MEM_freeN(edit->mirror_cache);
03262             edit->mirror_cache= NULL;
03263         }
03264 
03265         /* create tree for interpolation */
03266         if (pset->flag & PE_INTERPOLATE_ADDED && psys->totpart) {
03267             tree=BLI_kdtree_new(psys->totpart);
03268             
03269             for (i=0, pa=psys->particles; i<totpart; i++, pa++) {
03270                 psys_particle_on_dm(psmd->dm,psys->part->from,pa->num,pa->num_dmcache,pa->fuv,pa->foffset,cur_co,0,0,0,0,0);
03271                 BLI_kdtree_insert(tree, i, cur_co, NULL);
03272             }
03273 
03274             BLI_kdtree_balance(tree);
03275         }
03276 
03277         edit->totpoint= psys->totpart= newtotpart;
03278 
03279         /* create new elements */
03280         pa= psys->particles + totpart;
03281         point= edit->points + totpart;
03282 
03283         for (i=totpart; i<newtotpart; i++, pa++, point++) {
03284             memcpy(pa, add_pars + i - totpart, sizeof(ParticleData));
03285             pa->hair= MEM_callocN(pset->totaddkey * sizeof(HairKey), "BakeKey key add");
03286             key= point->keys= MEM_callocN(pset->totaddkey * sizeof(PTCacheEditKey), "PTCacheEditKey add");
03287             point->totkey= pa->totkey= pset->totaddkey;
03288 
03289             for (k=0, hkey=pa->hair; k<pa->totkey; k++, hkey++, key++) {
03290                 key->co= hkey->co;
03291                 key->time= &hkey->time;
03292 
03293                 if (!(psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR))
03294                     key->flag |= PEK_USE_WCO;
03295             }
03296             
03297             pa->size= 1.0f;
03298             initialize_particle(&sim, pa,i);
03299             reset_particle(&sim, pa, 0.0, 1.0);
03300             point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
03301             if (pe_x_mirror(ob))
03302                 point->flag |= PEP_TAG; /* signal for duplicate */
03303             
03304             framestep= pa->lifetime/(float)(pset->totaddkey-1);
03305 
03306             if (tree) {
03307                 ParticleData *ppa;
03308                 HairKey *thkey;
03309                 ParticleKey key3[3];
03310                 KDTreeNearest ptn[3];
03311                 int w, maxw;
03312                 float maxd, totw=0.0, weight[3];
03313 
03314                 psys_particle_on_dm(psmd->dm,psys->part->from,pa->num,pa->num_dmcache,pa->fuv,pa->foffset,co1,0,0,0,0,0);
03315                 maxw= BLI_kdtree_find_n_nearest(tree,3,co1,NULL,ptn);
03316 
03317                 maxd= ptn[maxw-1].dist;
03318                 
03319                 for (w=0; w<maxw; w++) {
03320                     weight[w]= (float)pow(2.0, (double)(-6.0f * ptn[w].dist / maxd));
03321                     totw += weight[w];
03322                 }
03323                 for (;w<3; w++) {
03324                     weight[w]= 0.0f;
03325                 }
03326 
03327                 for (w=0; w<maxw; w++)
03328                     weight[w] /= totw;
03329 
03330                 ppa= psys->particles+ptn[0].index;
03331 
03332                 for (k=0; k<pset->totaddkey; k++) {
03333                     thkey= (HairKey*)pa->hair + k;
03334                     thkey->time= pa->time + k * framestep;
03335 
03336                     key3[0].time= thkey->time/ 100.0f;
03337                     psys_get_particle_on_path(&sim, ptn[0].index, key3, 0);
03338                     mul_v3_fl(key3[0].co, weight[0]);
03339                     
03340                     /* TODO: interpolatint the weight would be nicer */
03341                     thkey->weight= (ppa->hair+MIN2(k, ppa->totkey-1))->weight;
03342                     
03343                     if (maxw>1) {
03344                         key3[1].time= key3[0].time;
03345                         psys_get_particle_on_path(&sim, ptn[1].index, &key3[1], 0);
03346                         mul_v3_fl(key3[1].co, weight[1]);
03347                         add_v3_v3(key3[0].co, key3[1].co);
03348 
03349                         if (maxw>2) {
03350                             key3[2].time= key3[0].time;
03351                             psys_get_particle_on_path(&sim, ptn[2].index, &key3[2], 0);
03352                             mul_v3_fl(key3[2].co, weight[2]);
03353                             add_v3_v3(key3[0].co, key3[2].co);
03354                         }
03355                     }
03356 
03357                     if (k==0)
03358                         sub_v3_v3v3(co1, pa->state.co, key3[0].co);
03359 
03360                     add_v3_v3v3(thkey->co, key3[0].co, co1);
03361 
03362                     thkey->time= key3[0].time;
03363                 }
03364             }
03365             else {
03366                 for (k=0, hkey=pa->hair; k<pset->totaddkey; k++, hkey++) {
03367                     madd_v3_v3v3fl(hkey->co, pa->state.co, pa->state.vel, k * framestep * timestep);
03368                     hkey->time += k * framestep;
03369                     hkey->weight = 1.f - (float)k/(float)(pset->totaddkey-1);
03370                 }
03371             }
03372             for (k=0, hkey=pa->hair; k<pset->totaddkey; k++, hkey++) {
03373                 psys_mat_hair_to_global(ob, psmd->dm, psys->part->from, pa, hairmat);
03374                 invert_m4_m4(imat,hairmat);
03375                 mul_m4_v3(imat, hkey->co);
03376             }
03377         }
03378 
03379         if (tree)
03380             BLI_kdtree_free(tree);
03381     }
03382     if (add_pars)
03383         MEM_freeN(add_pars);
03384     
03385     if (!psmd->dm->deformedOnly)
03386         dm->release(dm);
03387     
03388     return n;
03389 }
03390 
03391 /************************* brush edit operator ********************/
03392 
03393 typedef struct BrushEdit {
03394     Scene *scene;
03395     Object *ob;
03396     PTCacheEdit *edit;
03397 
03398     int first;
03399     int lastmouse[2];
03400 
03401     /* optional cached view settings to avoid setting on every mousemove */
03402     PEData data;
03403 } BrushEdit;
03404 
03405 static int brush_edit_init(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
03406 {
03407     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
03408     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
03409     ParticleEditSettings *pset= PE_settings(scene);
03410     PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, ob);
03411     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
03412     BrushEdit *bedit;
03413 
03414     if (pset->brushtype < 0)
03415         return 0;
03416 
03417     initgrabz(ar->regiondata, ob->obmat[3][0], ob->obmat[3][1], ob->obmat[3][2]);
03418 
03419     bedit= MEM_callocN(sizeof(BrushEdit), "BrushEdit");
03420     bedit->first= 1;
03421     op->customdata= bedit;
03422 
03423     bedit->scene= scene;
03424     bedit->ob= ob;
03425     bedit->edit= edit;
03426 
03427     /* cache view depths and settings for re-use */
03428     PE_set_view3d_data(C, &bedit->data);
03429 
03430     return 1;
03431 }
03432 
03433 static void brush_edit_apply(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, PointerRNA *itemptr)
03434 {
03435     BrushEdit *bedit= op->customdata;
03436     Scene *scene= bedit->scene;
03437     Object *ob= bedit->ob;
03438     PTCacheEdit *edit= bedit->edit;
03439     ParticleEditSettings *pset= PE_settings(scene);
03440     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd= edit->psys ? psys_get_modifier(ob, edit->psys) : NULL;
03441     ParticleBrushData *brush= &pset->brush[pset->brushtype];
03442     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
03443     float vec[3], mousef[2];
03444     int mval[2];
03445     int flip, mouse[2], removed= 0, added=0, selected= 0, tot_steps= 1, step= 1;
03446     float dx, dy, dmax;
03447     int lock_root = pset->flag & PE_LOCK_FIRST;
03448 
03449     if (!PE_start_edit(edit))
03450         return;
03451 
03452     RNA_float_get_array(itemptr, "mouse", mousef);
03453     mouse[0] = mousef[0];
03454     mouse[1] = mousef[1];
03455     flip= RNA_boolean_get(itemptr, "pen_flip");
03456 
03457     if (bedit->first) {
03458         bedit->lastmouse[0]= mouse[0];
03459         bedit->lastmouse[1]= mouse[1];
03460     }
03461 
03462     dx= mouse[0] - bedit->lastmouse[0];
03463     dy= mouse[1] - bedit->lastmouse[1];
03464 
03465     mval[0]= mouse[0];
03466     mval[1]= mouse[1];
03467 
03468 
03469     /* disable locking temporatily for disconnected hair */
03470     if (edit->psys && edit->psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR)
03471         pset->flag &= ~PE_LOCK_FIRST;
03472 
03473     if (((pset->brushtype == PE_BRUSH_ADD) ?
03474         (sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy) > pset->brush[PE_BRUSH_ADD].step) : (dx != 0 || dy != 0)) || bedit->first) {
03475         PEData data= bedit->data;
03476 
03477         view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
03478         selected= (short)count_selected_keys(scene, edit);
03479 
03480         dmax = maxf(fabsf(dx), fabsf(dy));
03481         tot_steps = dmax/(0.2f * brush->size) + 1;
03482 
03483         dx /= (float)tot_steps;
03484         dy /= (float)tot_steps;
03485 
03486         for (step = 1; step<=tot_steps; step++) {
03487             mval[0] = bedit->lastmouse[0] + step*dx;
03488             mval[1] = bedit->lastmouse[1] + step*dy;
03489 
03490             switch(pset->brushtype) {
03491                 case PE_BRUSH_COMB:
03492                 {
03493                     float mval_f[2];
03494                     data.mval= mval;
03495                     data.rad= (float)brush->size;
03496 
03497                     data.combfac= (brush->strength - 0.5f) * 2.0f;
03498                     if (data.combfac < 0.0f)
03499                         data.combfac= 1.0f - 9.0f * data.combfac;
03500                     else
03501                         data.combfac= 1.0f - data.combfac;
03502 
03503                     invert_m4_m4(ob->imat, ob->obmat);
03504 
03505                     mval_f[0]= dx;
03506                     mval_f[1]= dy;
03507                     ED_view3d_win_to_delta(ar, mval_f, vec);
03508                     data.dvec= vec;
03509 
03510                     foreach_mouse_hit_key(&data, brush_comb, selected);
03511                     break;
03512                 }
03513                 case PE_BRUSH_CUT:
03514                 {
03515                     if (edit->psys && edit->pathcache) {
03516                         data.mval= mval;
03517                         data.rad= (float)brush->size;
03518                         data.cutfac= brush->strength;
03519 
03520                         if (selected)
03521                             foreach_selected_point(&data, brush_cut);
03522                         else
03523                             foreach_point(&data, brush_cut);
03524 
03525                         removed= remove_tagged_particles(ob, edit->psys, pe_x_mirror(ob));
03526                         if (pset->flag & PE_KEEP_LENGTHS)
03527                             recalc_lengths(edit);
03528                     }
03529                     else
03530                         removed= 0;
03531 
03532                     break;
03533                 }
03534                 case PE_BRUSH_LENGTH:
03535                 {
03536                     data.mval= mval;
03537                 
03538                     data.rad= (float)brush->size;
03539                     data.growfac= brush->strength / 50.0f;
03540 
03541                     if (brush->invert ^ flip)
03542                         data.growfac= 1.0f - data.growfac;
03543                     else
03544                         data.growfac= 1.0f + data.growfac;
03545 
03546                     foreach_mouse_hit_point(&data, brush_length, selected);
03547 
03548                     if (pset->flag & PE_KEEP_LENGTHS)
03549                         recalc_lengths(edit);
03550                     break;
03551                 }
03552                 case PE_BRUSH_PUFF:
03553                 {
03554                     if (edit->psys) {
03555                         data.dm= psmd->dm;
03556                         data.mval= mval;
03557                         data.rad= (float)brush->size;
03558                         data.select= selected;
03559 
03560                         data.pufffac= (brush->strength - 0.5f) * 2.0f;
03561                         if (data.pufffac < 0.0f)
03562                             data.pufffac= 1.0f - 9.0f * data.pufffac;
03563                         else
03564                             data.pufffac= 1.0f - data.pufffac;
03565 
03566                         data.invert= (brush->invert ^ flip);
03567                         invert_m4_m4(ob->imat, ob->obmat);
03568 
03569                         foreach_mouse_hit_point(&data, brush_puff, selected);
03570                     }
03571                     break;
03572                 }
03573                 case PE_BRUSH_ADD:
03574                 {
03575                     if (edit->psys && edit->psys->part->from==PART_FROM_FACE) {
03576                         data.mval= mval;
03577 
03578                         added= brush_add(&data, brush->count);
03579 
03580                         if (pset->flag & PE_KEEP_LENGTHS)
03581                             recalc_lengths(edit);
03582                     }
03583                     else
03584                         added= 0;
03585                     break;
03586                 }
03587                 case PE_BRUSH_SMOOTH:
03588                 {
03589                     data.mval= mval;
03590                     data.rad= (float)brush->size;
03591 
03592                     data.vec[0]= data.vec[1]= data.vec[2]= 0.0f;
03593                     data.tot= 0;
03594 
03595                     data.smoothfac= brush->strength;
03596 
03597                     invert_m4_m4(ob->imat, ob->obmat);
03598 
03599                     foreach_mouse_hit_key(&data, brush_smooth_get, selected);
03600 
03601                     if (data.tot) {
03602                         mul_v3_fl(data.vec, 1.0f / (float)data.tot);
03603                         foreach_mouse_hit_key(&data, brush_smooth_do, selected);
03604                     }
03605 
03606                     break;
03607                 }
03608                 case PE_BRUSH_WEIGHT:
03609                 {
03610                     if (edit->psys) {
03611                         data.dm= psmd->dm;
03612                         data.mval= mval;
03613                         data.rad= (float)brush->size;
03614 
03615                         data.weightfac = brush->strength; /* note that this will never be zero */
03616 
03617                         foreach_mouse_hit_key(&data, brush_weight, selected);
03618                     }
03619 
03620                     break;
03621                 }
03622             }
03623             if ((pset->flag & PE_KEEP_LENGTHS)==0)
03624                 recalc_lengths(edit);
03625 
03626             if (ELEM(pset->brushtype, PE_BRUSH_ADD, PE_BRUSH_CUT) && (added || removed)) {
03627                 if (pset->brushtype == PE_BRUSH_ADD && pe_x_mirror(ob))
03628                     PE_mirror_x(scene, ob, 1);
03629 
03630                 update_world_cos(ob,edit);
03631                 psys_free_path_cache(NULL, edit);
03632                 DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
03633             }
03634             else
03635                 PE_update_object(scene, ob, 1);
03636         }
03637 
03638         if (edit->psys) {
03639             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_EDITED, ob);
03640         }
03641         else {
03642             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
03643             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, ob);
03644         }
03645 
03646         bedit->lastmouse[0]= mouse[0];
03647         bedit->lastmouse[1]= mouse[1];
03648         bedit->first= 0;
03649     }
03650 
03651     pset->flag |= lock_root;
03652 }
03653 
03654 static void brush_edit_exit(wmOperator *op)
03655 {
03656     BrushEdit *bedit= op->customdata;
03657 
03658     MEM_freeN(bedit);
03659 }
03660 
03661 static int brush_edit_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
03662 {
03663     if (!brush_edit_init(C, op))
03664         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03665 
03666     RNA_BEGIN(op->ptr, itemptr, "stroke") {
03667         brush_edit_apply(C, op, &itemptr);
03668     }
03669     RNA_END;
03670 
03671     brush_edit_exit(op);
03672 
03673     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03674 }
03675 
03676 static void brush_edit_apply_event(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
03677 {
03678     PointerRNA itemptr;
03679     float mouse[2];
03680 
03681     VECCOPY2D(mouse, event->mval);
03682 
03683     /* fill in stroke */
03684     RNA_collection_add(op->ptr, "stroke", &itemptr);
03685 
03686     RNA_float_set_array(&itemptr, "mouse", mouse);
03687     RNA_boolean_set(&itemptr, "pen_flip", event->shift != FALSE); // XXX hardcoded
03688 
03689     /* apply */
03690     brush_edit_apply(C, op, &itemptr);
03691 }
03692 
03693 static int brush_edit_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
03694 {
03695     if (!brush_edit_init(C, op))
03696         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03697     
03698     brush_edit_apply_event(C, op, event);
03699 
03700     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
03701 
03702     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
03703 }
03704 
03705 static int brush_edit_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
03706 {
03707     switch(event->type) {
03708         case LEFTMOUSE:
03709         case MIDDLEMOUSE:
03710         case RIGHTMOUSE: // XXX hardcoded
03711             brush_edit_exit(op);
03712             return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03713         case MOUSEMOVE:
03714             brush_edit_apply_event(C, op, event);
03715             break;
03716     }
03717 
03718     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
03719 }
03720 
03721 static int brush_edit_cancel(bContext *UNUSED(C), wmOperator *op)
03722 {
03723     brush_edit_exit(op);
03724 
03725     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03726 }
03727 
03728 void PARTICLE_OT_brush_edit(wmOperatorType *ot)
03729 {
03730     /* identifiers */
03731     ot->name = "Brush Edit";
03732     ot->idname = "PARTICLE_OT_brush_edit";
03733     
03734     /* api callbacks */
03735     ot->exec = brush_edit_exec;
03736     ot->invoke = brush_edit_invoke;
03737     ot->modal = brush_edit_modal;
03738     ot->cancel = brush_edit_cancel;
03739     ot->poll = PE_poll_view3d;
03740 
03741     /* flags */
03742     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO|OPTYPE_BLOCKING;
03743 
03744     /* properties */
03745     RNA_def_collection_runtime(ot->srna, "stroke", &RNA_OperatorStrokeElement, "Stroke", "");
03746 }
03747 
03748 /*********************** undo ***************************/
03749 
03750 static void free_PTCacheUndo(PTCacheUndo *undo)
03751 {
03752     PTCacheEditPoint *point;
03753     int i;
03754 
03755     for (i=0, point=undo->points; i<undo->totpoint; i++, point++) {
03756         if (undo->particles && (undo->particles + i)->hair)
03757             MEM_freeN((undo->particles + i)->hair);
03758         if (point->keys)
03759             MEM_freeN(point->keys);
03760     }
03761     if (undo->points)
03762         MEM_freeN(undo->points);
03763 
03764     if (undo->particles)
03765         MEM_freeN(undo->particles);
03766 
03767     BKE_ptcache_free_mem(&undo->mem_cache);
03768 }
03769 
03770 static void make_PTCacheUndo(PTCacheEdit *edit, PTCacheUndo *undo)
03771 {
03772     PTCacheEditPoint *point;
03773     int i;
03774 
03775     undo->totpoint= edit->totpoint;
03776 
03777     if (edit->psys) {
03778         ParticleData *pa;
03779 
03780         pa= undo->particles= MEM_dupallocN(edit->psys->particles);
03781 
03782         for (i=0; i<edit->totpoint; i++, pa++)
03783             pa->hair= MEM_dupallocN(pa->hair);
03784 
03785         undo->psys_flag = edit->psys->flag;
03786     }
03787     else {
03788         PTCacheMem *pm;
03789 
03790         BLI_duplicatelist(&undo->mem_cache, &edit->pid.cache->mem_cache);
03791         pm = undo->mem_cache.first;
03792 
03793         for (; pm; pm=pm->next) {
03794             for (i=0; i<BPHYS_TOT_DATA; i++)
03795                 pm->data[i] = MEM_dupallocN(pm->data[i]);
03796         }
03797     }
03798 
03799     point= undo->points = MEM_dupallocN(edit->points);
03800     undo->totpoint = edit->totpoint;
03801 
03802     for (i=0; i<edit->totpoint; i++, point++) {
03803         point->keys= MEM_dupallocN(point->keys);
03804         /* no need to update edit key->co & key->time pointers here */
03805     }
03806 }
03807 
03808 static void get_PTCacheUndo(PTCacheEdit *edit, PTCacheUndo *undo)
03809 {
03810     ParticleSystem *psys = edit->psys;
03811     ParticleData *pa;
03812     HairKey *hkey;
03813     POINT_P; KEY_K;
03814 
03815     LOOP_POINTS {
03816         if (psys && psys->particles[p].hair)
03817             MEM_freeN(psys->particles[p].hair);
03818 
03819         if (point->keys)
03820             MEM_freeN(point->keys);
03821     }
03822     if (psys && psys->particles)
03823         MEM_freeN(psys->particles);
03824     if (edit->points)
03825         MEM_freeN(edit->points);
03826     if (edit->mirror_cache) {
03827         MEM_freeN(edit->mirror_cache);
03828         edit->mirror_cache= NULL;
03829     }
03830 
03831     edit->points= MEM_dupallocN(undo->points);
03832     edit->totpoint = undo->totpoint;
03833 
03834     LOOP_POINTS {
03835         point->keys= MEM_dupallocN(point->keys);
03836     }
03837 
03838     if (psys) {
03839         psys->particles= MEM_dupallocN(undo->particles);
03840 
03841         psys->totpart= undo->totpoint;
03842 
03843         LOOP_POINTS {
03844             pa = psys->particles + p;
03845             hkey= pa->hair = MEM_dupallocN(pa->hair);
03846 
03847             LOOP_KEYS {
03848                 key->co= hkey->co;
03849                 key->time= &hkey->time;
03850                 hkey++;
03851             }
03852         }
03853 
03854         psys->flag = undo->psys_flag;
03855     }
03856     else {
03857         PTCacheMem *pm;
03858         int i;
03859 
03860         BKE_ptcache_free_mem(&edit->pid.cache->mem_cache);
03861 
03862         BLI_duplicatelist(&edit->pid.cache->mem_cache, &undo->mem_cache);
03863 
03864         pm = edit->pid.cache->mem_cache.first;
03865 
03866         for (; pm; pm=pm->next) {
03867             for (i=0; i<BPHYS_TOT_DATA; i++)
03868                 pm->data[i] = MEM_dupallocN(pm->data[i]);
03869 
03870             BKE_ptcache_mem_pointers_init(pm);
03871 
03872             LOOP_POINTS {
03873                 LOOP_KEYS {
03874                     if ((int)key->ftime == (int)pm->frame) {
03875                         key->co = pm->cur[BPHYS_DATA_LOCATION];
03876                         key->vel = pm->cur[BPHYS_DATA_VELOCITY];
03877                         key->rot = pm->cur[BPHYS_DATA_ROTATION];
03878                         key->time = &key->ftime;
03879                     }
03880                 }
03881                 BKE_ptcache_mem_pointers_incr(pm);
03882             }
03883         }
03884     }
03885 }
03886 
03887 void PE_undo_push(Scene *scene, const char *str)
03888 {
03889     PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, OBACT);
03890     PTCacheUndo *undo;
03891     int nr;
03892 
03893     if (!edit) return;
03894 
03895     /* remove all undos after (also when curundo==NULL) */
03896     while (edit->undo.last != edit->curundo) {
03897         undo= edit->undo.last;
03898         BLI_remlink(&edit->undo, undo);
03899         free_PTCacheUndo(undo);
03900         MEM_freeN(undo);
03901     }
03902 
03903     /* make new */
03904     edit->curundo= undo= MEM_callocN(sizeof(PTCacheUndo), "particle undo file");
03905     BLI_strncpy(undo->name, str, sizeof(undo->name));
03906     BLI_addtail(&edit->undo, undo);
03907     
03908     /* and limit amount to the maximum */
03909     nr= 0;
03910     undo= edit->undo.last;
03911     while (undo) {
03912         nr++;
03913         if (nr==U.undosteps) break;
03914         undo= undo->prev;
03915     }
03916     if (undo) {
03917         while (edit->undo.first!=undo) {
03918             PTCacheUndo *first= edit->undo.first;
03919             BLI_remlink(&edit->undo, first);
03920             free_PTCacheUndo(first);
03921             MEM_freeN(first);
03922         }
03923     }
03924 
03925     /* copy  */
03926     make_PTCacheUndo(edit,edit->curundo);
03927 }
03928 
03929 void PE_undo_step(Scene *scene, int step)
03930 {   
03931     PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, OBACT);
03932 
03933     if (!edit) return;
03934 
03935     if (step==0) {
03936         get_PTCacheUndo(edit,edit->curundo);
03937     }
03938     else if (step==1) {
03939         
03940         if (edit->curundo==NULL || edit->curundo->prev==NULL);
03941         else {
03942             if (G.debug & G_DEBUG) printf("undo %s\n", edit->curundo->name);
03943             edit->curundo= edit->curundo->prev;
03944             get_PTCacheUndo(edit, edit->curundo);
03945         }
03946     }
03947     else {
03948         /* curundo has to remain current situation! */
03949         
03950         if (edit->curundo==NULL || edit->curundo->next==NULL);
03951         else {
03952             get_PTCacheUndo(edit, edit->curundo->next);
03953             edit->curundo= edit->curundo->next;
03954             if (G.debug & G_DEBUG) printf("redo %s\n", edit->curundo->name);
03955         }
03956     }
03957 
03958     DAG_id_tag_update(&OBACT->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
03959 }
03960 
03961 int PE_undo_valid(Scene *scene)
03962 {
03963     PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, OBACT);
03964     
03965     if (edit) {
03966         return (edit->undo.last != edit->undo.first);
03967     }
03968     return 0;
03969 }
03970 
03971 static void PTCacheUndo_clear(PTCacheEdit *edit)
03972 {
03973     PTCacheUndo *undo;
03974 
03975     if (edit==NULL) return;
03976     
03977     undo= edit->undo.first;
03978     while (undo) {
03979         free_PTCacheUndo(undo);
03980         undo= undo->next;
03981     }
03982     BLI_freelistN(&edit->undo);
03983     edit->curundo= NULL;
03984 }
03985 
03986 void PE_undo(Scene *scene)
03987 {
03988     PE_undo_step(scene, 1);
03989 }
03990 
03991 void PE_redo(Scene *scene)
03992 {
03993     PE_undo_step(scene, -1);
03994 }
03995 
03996 void PE_undo_number(Scene *scene, int nr)
03997 {
03998     PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, OBACT);
03999     PTCacheUndo *undo;
04000     int a=0;
04001     
04002     for (undo= edit->undo.first; undo; undo= undo->next, a++) {
04003         if (a==nr) break;
04004     }
04005     edit->curundo= undo;
04006     PE_undo_step(scene, 0);
04007 }
04008 
04009 
04010 /* get name of undo item, return null if no item with this index */
04011 /* if active pointer, set it to 1 if true */
04012 const char *PE_undo_get_name(Scene *scene, int nr, int *active)
04013 {
04014     PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, OBACT);
04015     PTCacheUndo *undo;
04016     
04017     if (active) *active= 0;
04018     
04019     if (edit) {
04020         undo= BLI_findlink(&edit->undo, nr);
04021         if (undo) {
04022             if (active && undo==edit->curundo)
04023                 *active= 1;
04024             return undo->name;
04025         }
04026     }
04027     return NULL;
04028 }
04029 
04030 /************************ utilities ******************************/
04031 
04032 int PE_minmax(Scene *scene, float min[3], float max[3])
04033 {
04034     Object *ob= OBACT;
04035     PTCacheEdit *edit= PE_get_current(scene, ob);
04036     ParticleSystem *psys;
04037     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd = NULL;
04038     POINT_P; KEY_K;
04039     float co[3], mat[4][4];
04040     int ok= 0;
04041 
04042     if (!edit) return ok;
04043 
04044     if ((psys = edit->psys))
04045         psmd= psys_get_modifier(ob, psys);
04046     else
04047         unit_m4(mat);
04048 
04049     LOOP_VISIBLE_POINTS {
04050         if (psys)
04051             psys_mat_hair_to_global(ob, psmd->dm, psys->part->from, psys->particles+p, mat);
04052 
04053         LOOP_SELECTED_KEYS {
04054             copy_v3_v3(co, key->co);
04055             mul_m4_v3(mat, co);
04056             DO_MINMAX(co, min, max);        
04057             ok= 1;
04058         }
04059     }
04060 
04061     if (!ok) {
04062         minmax_object(ob, min, max);
04063         ok= 1;
04064     }
04065   
04066     return ok;
04067 }

04069 /************************ particle edit toggle operator ************************/
04070 
04071 /* initialize needed data for bake edit */
04072 static void PE_create_particle_edit(Scene *scene, Object *ob, PointCache *cache, ParticleSystem *psys)
04073 {
04074     PTCacheEdit *edit= (psys)? psys->edit : cache->edit;
04075     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd= (psys)? psys_get_modifier(ob, psys): NULL;
04076     POINT_P; KEY_K;
04077     ParticleData *pa = NULL;
04078     HairKey *hkey;
04079     int totpoint;
04080 
04081     /* no psmd->dm happens in case particle system modifier is not enabled */
04082     if (!(psys && psmd && psmd->dm) && !cache)
04083         return;
04084 
04085     if (cache && cache->flag & PTCACHE_DISK_CACHE)
04086         return;
04087 
04088     if (psys == NULL && cache->mem_cache.first == NULL)
04089         return;
04090 
04091     if (!edit) {
04092         totpoint = psys ? psys->totpart : (int)((PTCacheMem*)cache->mem_cache.first)->totpoint;
04093 
04094         edit= MEM_callocN(sizeof(PTCacheEdit), "PE_create_particle_edit");
04095         edit->points=MEM_callocN(totpoint*sizeof(PTCacheEditPoint),"PTCacheEditPoints");
04096         edit->totpoint = totpoint;
04097 
04098         if (psys && !cache) {
04099             psys->edit= edit;
04100             edit->psys = psys;
04101 
04102             psys->free_edit= PE_free_ptcache_edit;
04103 
04104             edit->pathcache = NULL;
04105             edit->pathcachebufs.first = edit->pathcachebufs.last = NULL;
04106 
04107             pa = psys->particles;
04108             LOOP_POINTS {
04109                 point->totkey = pa->totkey;
04110                 point->keys= MEM_callocN(point->totkey*sizeof(PTCacheEditKey),"ParticleEditKeys");
04111                 point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
04112 
04113                 hkey = pa->hair;
04114                 LOOP_KEYS {
04115                     key->co= hkey->co;
04116                     key->time= &hkey->time;
04117                     key->flag= hkey->editflag;
04118                     if (!(psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR)) {
04119                         key->flag |= PEK_USE_WCO;
04120                         hkey->editflag |= PEK_USE_WCO;
04121                     }
04122 
04123                     hkey++;
04124                 }
04125                 pa++;
04126             }
04127             update_world_cos(ob, edit);
04128         }
04129         else {
04130             PTCacheMem *pm;
04131             int totframe=0;
04132 
04133             cache->edit= edit;
04134             cache->free_edit= PE_free_ptcache_edit;
04135             edit->psys = NULL;
04136 
04137             for (pm=cache->mem_cache.first; pm; pm=pm->next)
04138                 totframe++;
04139 
04140             for (pm=cache->mem_cache.first; pm; pm=pm->next) {
04141                 LOOP_POINTS {
04142                     if (BKE_ptcache_mem_pointers_seek(p, pm) == 0)
04143                         continue;
04144 
04145                     if (!point->totkey) {
04146                         key = point->keys = MEM_callocN(totframe*sizeof(PTCacheEditKey),"ParticleEditKeys");
04147                         point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
04148                     }
04149                     else
04150                         key = point->keys + point->totkey;
04151 
04152                     key->co = pm->cur[BPHYS_DATA_LOCATION];
04153                     key->vel = pm->cur[BPHYS_DATA_VELOCITY];
04154                     key->rot = pm->cur[BPHYS_DATA_ROTATION];
04155                     key->ftime = (float)pm->frame;
04156                     key->time = &key->ftime;
04157                     BKE_ptcache_mem_pointers_incr(pm);
04158 
04159                     point->totkey++;
04160                 }
04161             }
04162             psys = NULL;
04163         }
04164 
04165         UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(TH_EDGE_SELECT, edit->sel_col);
04166         UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(TH_WIRE, edit->nosel_col);
04167 
04168         recalc_lengths(edit);
04169         if (psys && !cache)
04170             recalc_emitter_field(ob, psys);
04171         PE_update_object(scene, ob, 1);
04172 
04173         PTCacheUndo_clear(edit);
04174         PE_undo_push(scene, "Original");
04175     }
04176 }
04177 
04178 static int particle_edit_toggle_poll(bContext *C)
04179 {
04180     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
04181     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
04182 
04183     if (!scene || !ob || ob->id.lib)
04184         return 0;
04185     
04186     return (ob->particlesystem.first || modifiers_findByType(ob, eModifierType_Cloth) || modifiers_findByType(ob, eModifierType_Softbody));
04187 }
04188 
04189 static int particle_edit_toggle_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
04190 {
04191     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
04192     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
04193 
04194     if (!(ob->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT)) {
04195         PTCacheEdit *edit;
04196         ob->mode |= OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT;
04197         edit= PE_create_current(scene, ob);
04198     
04199         /* mesh may have changed since last entering editmode.
04200          * note, this may have run before if the edit data was just created, so could avoid this and speed up a little */
04201         if (edit && edit->psys)
04202             recalc_emitter_field(ob, edit->psys);
04203         
04204         toggle_particle_cursor(C, 1);
04205         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_MODE|NS_MODE_PARTICLE, NULL);
04206     }
04207     else {
04208         ob->mode &= ~OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT;
04209         toggle_particle_cursor(C, 0);
04210         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_MODE|NS_MODE_OBJECT, NULL);
04211     }
04212 
04213     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
04214 
04215     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
04216 }
04217 
04218 void PARTICLE_OT_particle_edit_toggle(wmOperatorType *ot)
04219 {
04220     /* identifiers */
04221     ot->name = "Particle Edit Toggle";
04222     ot->idname = "PARTICLE_OT_particle_edit_toggle";
04223     
04224     /* api callbacks */
04225     ot->exec = particle_edit_toggle_exec;
04226     ot->poll = particle_edit_toggle_poll;
04227 
04228     /* flags */
04229     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
04230 }

04232 
04233 /************************ set editable operator ************************/
04234 
04235 static int clear_edited_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
04236 {
04237     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
04238     ParticleSystem *psys = psys_get_current(ob);
04239     
04240     if (psys->edit) {
04241         if (psys->edit->edited || 1) { // XXX okee("Lose changes done in particle mode?"))
04242             PE_free_ptcache_edit(psys->edit);
04243 
04244             psys->edit = NULL;
04245             psys->free_edit = NULL;
04246 
04247             psys->recalc |= PSYS_RECALC_RESET;
04248             psys->flag &= ~PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR;
04249             psys->flag &= ~PSYS_EDITED;
04250 
04251             psys_reset(psys, PSYS_RESET_DEPSGRAPH);
04252             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_EDITED, ob);
04253             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
04254         }
04255     }
04256     else { /* some operation might have protected hair from editing so let's clear the flag */
04257         psys->recalc |= PSYS_RECALC_RESET;
04258         psys->flag &= ~PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR;
04259         psys->flag &= ~PSYS_EDITED;
04260         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_EDITED, ob);
04261         DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
04262     }
04263 
04264     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
04265 }
04266 
04267 void PARTICLE_OT_edited_clear(wmOperatorType *ot)
04268 {
04269     /* identifiers */
04270     ot->name = "Clear Edited";
04271     ot->idname = "PARTICLE_OT_edited_clear";
04272     
04273     /* api callbacks */
04274     ot->exec = clear_edited_exec;
04275     ot->poll = particle_edit_toggle_poll;
04276 
04277     /* flags */
04278     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
04279 }
